steps.tryzf54v: From the start head right at the first turn and pick up the @soul-of-a-deserted-corpse
steps.v3cywfyn: Loot the corpse on the fountain to obtain the @ashen-estus-flask
steps.gou13ruc: Turn right after the fountain and head down the path through a flooded passage. Kill the @ravenous-crystal-lizard to get a @titanite-scale and then pick up the @soul-of-an-unknown-traveler from the corpse in the area
steps.yxwhhdyj: The @speckled-stoneplate-ring[Speckled Stoneplate Ring+1] is also in this area
steps.6bt0fkcx: Head back to the fountain and take the path straight ahead. Climb the cliff and rest at the Cemetery of Ash bonfire to receive the Rest gesture
steps.v9j3b5g3: From the bonfire head down the left path and jump from the cliff over to the corpse on the tomb to pick up a @titanite-shard
steps.rg6gfbkb: Take the side ridge down from the large cliff face on the right to pick up @firebomb[Firebomb x5] from a nearby corpse
steps.6vbsjxns: Back on the main path head through the archway and take the sword embedded in the statue. Kill @iudex-gundyr to receive the @coiled-sword
steps.f21vv7h5: Congratulate yourself on beating the first boss of Dark Souls 3 and rest at the @iudex-gundyr bonfire
steps.m7g3i1b2: Continue through the large door and pick up the @broken-straight-sword from the corpse leaning on the tombstone
steps.q3zagrd5: The @wolf-ring[Wolf Ring+2] is behind the door you just passed
steps.0s4ujto8: Head over to the large cliff edge and pick up the @homeward-bone at the edge of the ridge
steps.w1xieuht: Take the left path up the cliff and turn left just before @firelink-shrine and grab the @east-west-shield from the corpse on the tree
steps.9a3i5r3f: Kill @sword-master[Sword Master Saber] to get @uchigatana + @masters-set and to unlock his summon sign
steps.uibp7mly: Head back and up the path to the left to pick up an @ember from a corpse above the entrance above @firelink-shrine
steps.z64ddxw3: Continue across to the other side picking up a @homeward-bone from a corpse behind a tomb and another @ember from the lower ridge
steps.shgqd2y6: Go back to the main path and enter @firelink-shrine

steps.p9ti0dqm: Talk to @hawkwood to receive the Collapse gesture
steps.oa0xkmb1: Talk to @blacksmith-andre to receive the Hurrah! gesture
steps.uf21kgb4: Go out the top of @firelink-shrine and pick up the @soul-of-a-deserted-corpse from the corpse next to the small decrepit tower
steps.5vonwvls: When you have the @tower-key, unlock the small decrepit tower and head up to the bridge leading to the Bell Tower
steps.g6bdjpgs: Roll off the bridge onto the @firelink-shrine roof and kick down the ladder shortcut
steps.zz1wem8m: Just behind the roof kill the @crystal-lizard to get a @twinkling-titanite
steps.xjpmgj9j: Pick up @homeward-bone[Homeward Bone x3] from the lower part of the roof
steps.8zmfycz2: Inside the roof pick up the @estus-shard from up in the rafters
steps.zhqol7rf: Trade a @homeward-bone with @pickle-pee-pump-a-rum-crow[Pickle-Pee, Pump-a-Rum] crow to receive the Call Over gesture and the @iron-bracelets. For the other trade options see the #[Misc] page
steps.9jcvoozt: Hit the @illusory-walls[illusory wall] at the back of the rafters and drop down to get the @covetous-silver-serpent-ring from the chest
steps.wc0nf8m7: Head into the Bell Tower, go up the lift and @unbreakable-patches[Patches] may close the door depending on your progress in the game
steps.71fudb4w: At the top of the Bell Tower, pick up the @fire-keeper-soul
steps.a8675ubz: Go back down the lift and look down the right side. Carefully jump down to the tombstone and pick up the @fire-keeper-set from the corpse
steps.1kn6gn4t: Make your way down to the bottom and pick up the @estus-ring from another corpse and open the door

steps.93swmlx0: Open the door ahead and rest at the High Wall of Lothric bonfire
steps.5tqt27b8: Take the right path onto the rampart and head down the small stairs on the left. Pick up the @soul-of-a-deserted-corpse from the corpse
steps.ppuqr2xb: Head back up the stairs and up the next set of stairs at the end of the rampart. If you want @titanite-shard + @ember, wait for one of the undead to transform into @pus-of-man and then kill it. Also, pick up @longbow + @standard-arrow[Standard Arrow x12] from the corpse
steps.baw5vp0t: Go back to the bonfire and this time head down the left path. Pick up the @soul-of-a-deserted-corpse from the corpse
steps.6vuksikz: Head up the stairs at the end of the rampart and up some more stairs to the top of the turret. Pick up the @binoculars from the corpse
steps.lfcmer73: Go back downstairs and drop down behind the dragon. Enter the small doorway to pick up @gold-pine-resin[Gold Pine Resin x2] from the corpse
steps.joq13och: Drop into the indoor room and pick up @firebomb[Firebomb x2] from the corpse beside the table
steps.fruly2fp: Go down the ladder and pick up the @soul-of-a-deserted-corpse from the corpse outside of the cell
steps.37wgm0qh: Snipe the dragon until it drops a @large-titanite-shard and flies away
steps.e5fl0k7t: Grab the @claymore, @club, @ember and @large-soul-of-a-deserted-corpse from in front of where the dragon was
steps.c2vg980s: Open the door underneath where the dragon was. Go downstairs. Either kill the @mimic or hit it with an @undead-hunter-charm to get the @battle-axe[Deep Battle Axe]
steps.tneax9at: Head out the door on the other side and pick up the @soul-of-a-deserted-corpse from the corpse on the left
steps.awtg50qs: Go into the next building and pick up @firebomb[Firebomb x3] from the wooden beam
steps.8jw7i0r5: Go out the side exit and up the stairs and pick up the @titanite-shard from the corpse. Light the Tower on the Wall bonfire
steps.ubi5g9q4: After lighting the Tower on the Wall bonfire, return to @firelink-shrine and talk to @leonhard[Ringfinger Leonhard] who gives you @cracked-red-eye-orb[Cracked Red Eye Orb x5]. He'll be by Lothric's throne. If he isn't at this point, try killing Vordt and check again
steps.hdx9wpuf: Back inside the building go down the stairs, out the side door, and pick up a @soul-of-a-deserted-corpse from the corpse on the right
steps.5wld10ym: Head onto the roof. If you want @titanite-shard + @ember, wait for one of the undead to transform into @pus-of-man and then kill it. And pick up @firebomb[Firebomb x3] from the corpse. Continue on and kill the @crystal-lizard to receive a @raw-gem. There is another corpse on the roof which holds a @large-soul-of-a-deserted-corpse
steps.mdhzm2k2: The @fleshbite-ring[Fleshbite Ring+1] is on another roof that can be jumped to
steps.6jpw0emb: Take the ladder down and go onto the side roof to get @black-firebomb[Black Firebomb x3] from the corpse
steps.gz91dr6s: On the adjacent balcony with the archers pick up @firebomb[Firebomb x3] from the corpse
steps.zrcwpnd3: Go back inside the earlier building next to the ladder. Take the immediate left and roll into the pots to get @undead-hunter-charm[Undead Hunter Charm x2] from the corpse. Continue inside and grab the @titanite-shard from the corpse while being cautious of the ambush
steps.m6tc10ro: Back in the main room pick up the @soul-of-a-deserted-corpse from the corpse tucked inside the first corner
steps.34dm98p0: Continue through the doorway and take the next door on the left. Pick up the @broadsword from the corpse
steps.jk6b16j5: Head down the stairs taking the right path and get the @silver-eagle-kite-shield from the chest
steps.hya40xns: Head back to the original entrance and find the doorway blocked by debris. Roll through it and pick up @green-blossom[Green Blossom x2] at the end of the ledge
steps.fvj3ujjq: Drop down and pick up the @astora-straight-sword from the chest
steps.hu8intt1: Continue into the room and pick up the @cell-key and @titanite-shard from the corpses around the room
steps.blnfqccq: Grab an @estus-shard on the altar in the same room
steps.xy5czwxg: The @ring-of-the-evil-eye[Ring of the Evil Eye+2] is in the back of the room behind some barrels
steps.ruhnyvf9: Head out the lower level and drop down to pick up the @rapier next to the drain
steps.aq4g8arx: On corpses around the fountain you can collect @ember and another @ember
steps.fj3pjibd: Head out towards the courtyard and turn left to pick up the @soul-of-a-deserted-corpse from a corpse
steps.t2g6oh0u: Go upstairs right of the courtyard entrance and head straight along the path. After leaving the first door immediately turn left to find @green-blossom[Green Blossom x3] on a corpse
steps.6113mfcq: Activate the elevator to open up a shortcut from the High Wall bonfire. Behind the elevator at the top is @throwing-knife[Throwing Knife x6] on a corpse
steps.fofai6rw: Travel to the Tower on the Wall and proceed all the way down inside the tower. Go into the next room and pick up @throwing-knife[Throwing Knife x8] on the corpse
steps.gh7q3i6j: Continue along the passageway and pick up the @mail-breaker opposite the door on a corpse
steps.td45pjv3: Further down in this area you will find a locked cell. With the @cell-key you can free @greirat-of-the-undead-settlement and talk to him. If you agree to find Loretta, he gives you the @blue-tearstone-ring. He then moves to @firelink-shrine
steps.0jjgjyla: Travel to the High Wall of Lothric and take the elevator shortcut down. Head back towards the main courtyard but this time take the stairs to the left overlooking the fountain area. Grab the @large-soul-of-a-deserted-corpse on the rooftop
steps.hnj5cb5x: Jump onto the awning to pick up a @ring-of-sacrifice
steps.ktzgjk0y: Continue back to the courtyard. In the corner of the terrace just before the stairs leading down, you can summon @lion-knight-albert
steps.5rkikgb6: Head to the left. Go up the stairs on the left just before the castle and kill the red-eyed @lothric-knight to get a @refined-gem
steps.3mj8wlms: Inside the chapel talk to @emma[Emma, High Priestess of Lothric Castle] to receive the @small-lothric-banner. Talk to her again for the @way-of-blue covenant
steps.66iq9agr: Heading out from the chapel take the left stairs and pick up the @lucerne from the corpse
steps.ihv5totq: Just before walking through the great gate, you can summon @sword-master[Sword Master Saber] if he was killed earlier at Firelink Shrine
steps.svk1odzb: Proceed through the gate and kill @vordt-of-the-boreal-valley; receive @soul-of-boreal-valley-vordt. After killing Vordt, raise the banner at the cliff to access the @undead-settlement

steps.mnc016a9: After the Bat Wing Demons have dropped you off, walk to the left and grab a @large-soul-of-a-deserted-corpse
steps.hgknbky4: Go downstairs. Walk behind an overturned carriage and kill two @dog[Dogs] to get @alluring-skull[Alluring Skull x2]
steps.l29cvfmo: Find @yoel-of-londor below the Foot of the High Wall bonfire amongst several other Pilgrims. Talk to him and agree to his request and he moves to Firelink Shrine. Head back to Firelink Shrine and talk to Yoel to receive the Beckon gesture. Accept Yoel's offer to Draw Out True Strength which gains you a free level and a @dark-sigil. From now on, for each time you die, you gain 1 Hollowing per Dark Sigil. Yoel offers 4 more free levels at 2, 6, 12, and 15 Hollowing, so getting all 5 Dark Sigils should not take long. If you do not get all 5 Dark Sigils before reaching the Catacombs of Carthus, Yoel dies which voids the Usurpation of Fire Ending
steps.23qaaue2: After you get all 5 Dark Sigils and refresh the world, Yoel dies with @yuria-of-londor watching over his newfound corpse. Talk to her to receive the Dignified Bow gesture and buy the @londor-braille-divine-tome
steps.ghev8pzm: Near Yoel, you will find @homeward-bone[Homeward Bone x2] on the far left edge of the bridge
steps.hvxmefoi: From the Undead Settlement bonfire, enter the house. Cut down a glowing hanging corpse to get the @small-leather-shield
steps.6pqvexpg: Walk downstairs to get @charcoal-pine-bundle[Charcoal Pine Bundle x2]. Walk out onto the balcony and cut down the hanging body. Turn right around the corner to get @repair-powder[Repair Powder x2]
steps.ay87q98w: Walk downstairs to get another @charcoal-pine-bundle[Charcoal Pine Bundle x2]
steps.crg4fd66: Go outside and grab @lorettas-bone from the body you cut down
steps.cx59rajx: Grab an @estus-shard by the burning tree with worshipping undead
steps.pheuesyt: On the other side of the tree, grab an @ember. Shoot down a hanging corpse from the tree to get @kukri[Kukri x9]. Walk to the closed gate to grab a @soul-of-an-unknown-traveler
steps.18vkr15h: Walk to the right of the house to grab a @titanite-shard
steps.xbkx8uc3: Walk through a large archway of the house, open a door, and walk into the room. Grab @charcoal-pine-resin[Charcoal Pine Resin x2] from a corpse near the wall. Cut down the bodies hanging over the staircase to get a @large-soul-of-a-deserted-corpse. Drop down from a hole in the room. In this hidden room, discover the @warrior-of-sunlight covenant and consume @estus-soup
steps.tutr1qya: Open the door and walk to the end of the hallway. You should now be on the main street of the neighborhood. Head right and break through the wooden crates between the first gap on your right. Grab a @soul-of-an-unknown-traveler
steps.oksi5nsu: Walk back the main street and proceed. A wooden door should automatically break. Walk into that house to get the @whip
steps.3xchrwok: Proceed back onto the main street. Walk until you see a wooden wheel to your right. Walk around the corner to get a @titanite-shard
steps.1ylq0vy4: Climb up the balcony with an @evangelist. Grab a @titanite-shard
steps.fkbt9h2k: Climb down from the balcony and walk onto a rooftop. Jump onto the wooden platform on your left to grab @rusted-coin[Rusted Coin x2]
steps.ku5gjwmj: Jump down to kill the @crystal-lizard which drops a @sharp-gem. Light the Dilapidated Bridge bonfire further below
steps.tz4lr5l7: Mad dark spirit @holy-knight-hodrick will invade near the Dilapidated Bridge bonfire if you are embered. Kill him for his @vertebra-shackle
steps.fizcehk3: Get back to the burning tree near the beginning of Undead Settlement, walk across the bridge, and walk around the right which should be blocked by wooden crates and barrels. Walk towards the houses with the @thrall[Thralls]. Find a @fading-soul here. Walk around one of the houses to get the @plank-shield. Walk onto the rooftop of the house to your left and grab @firebomb[Firebomb x6]
steps.wydum8vv: Climb onto the rooftop of the other house and grab @homeward-bone[Homeward Bone x2]. Jump down to where a non-hostile Cage Carrier is walking around. Cut down the hanging corpse at the end and grab the @flame-stoneplate-ring. (If the corpse falls down and you are unable get the item, just proceed to the next step)
steps.41661ibe: Examine the Cage Carrier from behind. After you get out of your cage, walk towards the light. Grab the @wargod-wooden-shield. Talk to @holy-knight-hodrick to receive the @mound-maker[Mound-makers] covenant and a @homeward-bone. (If you have reached the Curse-rotted Greatwood before reaching the Cage Carrier, Hodrick dies and the Cage Carrier becomes hostile. Thus, you cannot acquire the covenant until later through Sirris' sidequest.) Quit and reload to reappear near the Cage Carrier. Retrieve the ring if you missed it before
steps.mc6a1mmj: Head back, dropping down a small ledge on the left. Enter the house near the bridge and pick up a @large-soul-of-a-deserted-corpse. Then open the backdoor
steps.kctvt17u: Walk across the bridge towards the house in view and jump down to the ledge on your right. When you are on the ledge, walk towards the bridge to get a @titanite-shard
steps.eir08pf7: The other way leads you to the Cliff Underside bonfire under the house and to a way up
steps.hv0clkbk: Walk to the top of the house and find a cage that houses @cornyx-of-the-great-swamp. Talk to him, and he moves to Firelink Shrine. At the Shrine, talk to him multiple times to receive your @pyromancy-flame (unless you are already a pyromancer) and the Welcome gesture
steps.l4whu4ee: Grab the @hand-axe and get a @partizan from a nearby hanging body
steps.v4wzyqvu: Walk down from the house and walk onto the gallow. Grab a @soul-of-an-unknown-traveler. Walk across the unfinished bridge to get the @fire-clutch-ring
steps.em5s5wkt: Walk through the archway of the house and down the stairs. Walk left and around the corner to get a @large-soul-of-a-deserted-corpse. Walk downstairs and towards a tree with a @dog. Kill it and get the @ember
steps.8qt69d19: Run towards the bridge, and enter the sewers on the right. Kill a Giant @rat to get the @bloodbite-ring. Grab the @caestus and climb up to open the shortcut
steps.ajjzfzak: Walk back through the sewers and onto the bridge to get another @ember. Walk upstairs towards the house on your right. Grab a @large-soul-of-a-deserted-corpse. Walk around the right side of the house to get @alluring-skull[Alluring Skull x3]
steps.emed2qi1: Walk towards the tower. Talk to @eygon-of-carim outside. If you have enough health, you can drop down into the valley to reach @irina-of-carim in her cell, but don't bother. You can reach Irina by purchasing the Grave Key from the Shrine Maiden after giving the maiden the @morticians-ashes which is futher down in this list
steps.af78osoy: Walk into the tower to find @siegward-of-catarina. Get on the elevator which goes down to the basement. Kill the @boreal-outrider-knight to get the @irithyll-straight-sword, grab the @ember and rest at the @road-of-sacrifices bonfire
steps.tcjdlifr: The @life-ring[Life Ring+1] is behind Siegward on the upcoming balcony
steps.dwzog6po: To reach the top of the tower, hit the switch on the elevator while at the main entrance and then quickly get off to reveal a second lift.
steps.lvotrh1s: After getting off the lift at the top you can find a @soul-of-a-nameless-soldier in a corner.
steps.h263f2ur: Go up the stairs and offer a token of friendship to the @giant-of-the-undead-settlement so that he does not attack you with giant arrows and even assists you when you are near a White Birch.
steps.4ufcq695: Take the lift down, and while facing the entrance of the tower, when you hear Siegward's voice; roll off to land onto a wooden platform.
steps.gxaf13ue: Head outside and speak to Siegward again.
steps.ztx3e5hm: Lure the the Fire Demon towards the tower which makes Siegward come and fight by your side.
steps.l05smlll: After killing the Fire Demon you gain a @fire-gem.
steps.bhuv0n7p: Speak to Siegward three times to receive a @siegbrau, the Toast gesture, and the Sleep gesture.
steps.vsm4gv0o: Around the town, you can grab a @homeward-bone and a @large-club. You can also get the @northern-armor-set from a nearby hanging corpse
steps.h2dwf1n9: A @pale-tongue can be found on a nearby hanging corpse. Obtaining the tongue here or from invading successfully leads to Leonhard returning to Firelink Shrine. He then gives you the @lift-chamber-key that opens the door below the Tower on the Wall bonfire of High Wall of Lothric. Kill the Darkwraith imprisoned there to get a @red-eye-orb. Return to Firelink Shrine and talk to Leonhard to receive the Applause gesture
steps.n30zaqt4: Walk into the house to get @red-bug-pellet[Red Bug Pellet x2]. Walk upstairs and grab @alluring-skull[Alluring Skull x2]. Walk across a bridge and into a house. Pillage a chest to get @human-pine-resin[Human Pine Resin x4]. Walk onto the roof and to the left to get @flynns-ring
steps.lzdtj9nm: The @covetous-silver-serpent-ring[Covetous Silver Serpent Ring+2] is on one of the lower rooftops
steps.viivtnf0: Drop down onto the ledge of a tower. Grab @homeward-bone[Homeward Bone x2]. Drop down from within the tower to get the @mirrah-set without the mask and the @chloranthy-ring
steps.arluhygk: Warp back to the Dilapidated Bridge bonfire, enter the graveyard pierced by giant arrows, and walk towards the house on the left. Grab @blue-wooden-shield + @cleric-set in front of the house and @morticians-ashes by a tree to the left. If dodging the giant arrows is too troublesome, head to the tower to befriend the Giant
steps.4uh6whof: The @poisonbite-ring[Poisonbite Ring+1] is behind the well
steps.9rsrrgei: Grab all the items around the White Birch (one of them being the @reinforced-club) including the @undead-bone-shard on the platform to the right of the White Birch
steps.o1b6s1qa: Enter the house and walk upstairs. Grab the @great-scythe. Continue to walk towards the stone building and open the doors on your right
steps.yazte9xw: Return to Firelink Shrine. Give @lorettas-bone to Greirat, who then allows you to keep the Blue Tearstone Ring. You can reload the area and talk to Greirat again to learn the Curl Up gesture. You can reload the area once more and send him to pillage Undead Settlement. He returns when you kill a boss
steps.s2zy1rzn: Give the Shrine Handmaid the @morticians-ashes and then purchase the @grave-key which opens the locked door in the sewer area next to the Dilapidated Bridge bonfire
steps.4cvb4xi3: Go back the sewer area and open the locked door. Climb down and walk towards @velka-the-goddess-of-sin[Velka the Goddess of Sin's statue] to grab a @loincloth
steps.ndgqxj1c: Proceed through the tunnel to get the @red-hilted-halberd. Continue into another room to get a @soul-of-an-unknown-traveler
steps.ehhwr4a9: Walk outside to kill a @crystal-lizard which drops a @heavy-gem. Grab the @titanite-shard and another @titanite-shard
steps.458yrpq6: Walk through the archway tunnel. Shoot down a hanging corpse to get a @red-and-white-shield[Blessed Red and White Shield+1]
steps.cxcqfofa: Walk into a new room and climb down to get a @saints-talisman
steps.26gb3h9j: Climb up and talk to @irina-of-carim to receive the Prayer gesture. Touch her and accept her services. She then moves to the Firelink Shrine. After recruiting Irina, make sure to go outside and speak to Eygon. At the shrine, you can give Irina the @londor-braille-divine-tome, but doing so and buying any of its spells leads to her Dark ending. Otherwise, hang onto it until you find Karla later in the game
steps.bwuukc59: Kill the @curse-rotted-greatwood to get @soul-of-the-rotted-greatwood + @transposing-kiln. Give the Transposing Kiln to @ludleth-of-courland so he can turn boss souls into weapons, rings, and spells
steps.bwh9ytl7: Talk to Hawkwood after killing the Greatwood to receive a @heavy-gem. If he does not give you anything, come back to him after killing another boss

steps.wjnagl60: If you haven't done so before, you can send Greirat to pillage Undead Settlement. He returns when you kill a boss
steps.bg4vy9gx: Travel to the Road of Sacrifices bonfire. Head down the path and drop down to the left of the tree to find a @shriving-stone
steps.6zx555w9: A bit farther on you'll find a @soul-of-an-unknown-traveler next to an overturned wagon
steps.1dotggli: The @chloranthy-ring[Chloranthy Ring+2] is down on a ledge behind the first Corvian Storyteller
steps.viot38dz: At the fork in the path, head left and drop off the path when it ends. Head left again (instead of going under the bridge) and kill the @madwoman NPC for the @butcher-knife
steps.z3tdikkc: Grab the @brigand-axe, the @brigand-set, and the @brigand-twindaggers from this lower area
steps.puc95pb0: Turn around and head back up the path and under the bridge. Head up and across the bridge for a @titanite-shard
steps.xoic7mt4: Cross back over the bridge and head to the next bridge. Before crossing it, drop off to the right to reach an area where you'll find the @braille-divine-tome-of-carim and @mornes-ring. Give the tome to @irina-of-carim at Firelink Shrine and buy all the spells it offers if you want her to become a Fire Keeper later in the game
steps.4vapuw37: Before entering the archway that leads to the Halfway Fortress bonfire, you can find an @ember on a ledge with a caster enemy
steps.w8gcms1r: Talk to @anri-of-astora at the Halfway Fortress bonfire. Talk to @horace-the-hushed to get the @blue-sentinels covenant. Make sure to deplete Anri's dialogue before continuing the game
steps.3lewemnf: After meeting Anri of Astora, return to Firelink Shrine to talk to @sirris-of-the-sunless-realms to begin her quest line
steps.hx5pza2m: Head into the Crucifixion Woods from the Halfway Fortress bonfire. Drop off the right side of the path as soon as it turns left, and drop again to grab a @soul-of-an-unknown-traveler
steps.jyiwk4r2: Drop off again and head straight while hugging the wall to your right. You'll arrive at a door. Head in and straight across to a balcony-type area where you'll find some stairs leading to the @sellsword-set
steps.0fn7j9of: Drop down to find the @sellsword-twinblades directly underneath the corpse that had the Sellsword Set
steps.w1jvi70s: A bit farther in the building you'll find the @farron-coal, which enables Heavy, Sharp, and Poison infusions
steps.i4i60ohv: Head back outside through the same door you used to enter. Step into the water and follow the edge of the water to the left. Hug the cliffs and you'll find a @titanite-shard
steps.g42xjeh8: Continue on with the cliff wall to your left. You'll head past the ramp that leads back up to the Halfway Fortress bonfire, but keep the cliff to your left after moving past it. You'll find another @titanite-shard
steps.3l588p6h: Continuing in this manner, you'll find a large group of @poisonhorn-bug[Poisonhorn Bugs] guarding yet another @titanite-shard
steps.j0270gdm: At this point, deviate from the cliff wall for a bit and head up the hill towards the water for the @twin-dragon-greatshield
steps.8zopwubm: Head towards the stone wall with the large broken arch (which you would have eventually reached had you stuck to the cliff wall). Grab the @fading-soul from the corpse before heading through
steps.711oh05s: Turn right soon after heading through the arch to reach the Crucifixion Woods bonfire. Walk along the rocky wall towards the ruins until you reach a purple summon sign for mad phantom @holy-knight-hodrick. When summoned, he instantly becomes hostile, so kill him for souls
steps.ul17b1u2: Head past where Hodrick's summon sign was until you reach a ledge. Fall down to grab the @estus-shard
steps.8bxavj59: Continue around the building to a large bonfire with an @ember
steps.0pyuz1li: Finish your circuit around the building for a @soul-of-an-unknown-traveler
steps.jsbgyras: Back at the Crucifixion Woods bonfire, drop off into the water and kill the @great-crab furthest away from you for the @great-swamp-ring
steps.5jnopgkh: If you are embered, dark spirit @yellowfinger-heysel invades around where the two giant crabs are. Kill her for @heysel-pick + @xanthous-crown
steps.fvqu7b1x: You will find the following items in the water: @green-blossom[Green Blossom x2], @green-blossom[Green Blossom x4], the @grass-crest-shield, the @conjurator-set, and the @great-swamp-pyromancy-tome. The tome and the set are in the deep part of the swamp near the entrance of @farron-keep
steps.61y1bl23: In the water near where you jump down from the Crucifixion Woods bonfire (near where the two Green Blossoms were), there are steps leading out of the water and a door to the left of them. Head through the door to find a small area with the @sage-ring and the @sorcerer-set
steps.9sxtzneq: The @lingering-dragoncrest-ring[Lingering Dragoncrest Ring+1] is next to a tree
steps.aefl6quu: Head back out of this small area and take the steps to your left. Enter the building and proceed to the next room ahead to find a hallway with a @crystal-lizard, which will drop a @crystal-gem when killed
steps.froek0li: Go back to the previous room and head up the steps all the way to a balcony. Drop off the broken end to reach a ledge with a @ring-of-sacrifice
steps.1nk63iru: Drop down, head back up the steps to the same room you were just in, and head up the stairs in the room, but only until you reach the broken wall. Head through down the path to grab the @golden-falcon-shield
steps.qup6s1r2: Drop down from here and kill the two NPCs for the @great-club and the @exile-greatsword
steps.rau36p1q: Near the water's edge is a corpse with the @fallen-knight-set. There is also a @large-soul-of-an-unknown-traveler by the wall
steps.hdvu7ysi: Head into the building the NPCs were guarding. There is @homeward-bone[Homeward Bone x2] on a balcony in here. Double back and head down the ladder to light the Farron Keep bonfire
steps.hp2mdhx1: Warp or run back to the Crucifixion Woods bonfire. Head into the ruins this time (the ones you previously traveled around before to grab the Estus Shard). The entrance is a hole in the wall in a small depression in the ground. In the first room you'll find the @heretics-staff in an alcove to the right
steps.xu4maybo: Continue on until you reach a 4-way crossroads and then go through the door on your left that looks like it leads to a wall. Turn right at the wall and you'll eventually arrive at @orbeck-of-vinheim. Talk to him and he agrees to teach you in sorceries only if you have at least 10 Intelligence and promise to bring him scrolls. He then moves to Firelink Shrine. If you do not bring him any scrolls before defeating 4 bosses, he will leave
steps.9vwkgsll: @orbeck-of-vinheim grants you different rewards based on certain criteria. If you are not a sorcerer, the @young-dragon-ring is given to you after buying three of his spells and giving him at least one scroll. You will be rewarded with the Silent Ally gesture and the @slumbering-dragoncrest-ring after buying Aural Decoy, Farron Flashsword, Pestilent Mist, and Spook.
steps.w3zzx6x2: There are broken steps that lead down from Orbeck's study with @blue-bug-pellet[Blue Bug Pellet x2]. Drop off to reach the final room before the boss
steps.bgzd8fzk: In this room, near one of the stone pillars, @eygon-of-carim has casted down a summon sign. You can summon him if you have recruited Irina to your Shrine and have not harmed her
steps.bhvlchby: Head down the winding paths past the Crystal Sage bonfire to find two Crystal Lizards, who will each drop a @twinkling-titanite
steps.drzjr7e0: Continue following these twisting paths until you can drop down next to a large fire and the @herald-set. Continue on to the Cathedral of the Deep bonfire

steps.7ck498p3: From the Cathedral of the Deep bonfire, head down to the left to find a hostile sword-wielding NPC and the @paladins-ashes behind him
steps.6m7omazh: Back up by the bonfire, start heading up the first set of steps, but turn left about halfway up. Follow the path and turn right at the end for a @titanite-shard in an alcove
steps.ogxpll04: Head back to the steps and head up to the top of this first set. Before climbing the second set of steps, head right this time and follow the path until you reach the @crest-shield
steps.ea9rqp2q: From here, you can jump down and kill the axe-wielding NPC on the steps (he can be struck with a plunge attack using a big enough weapon) to get the @spider-shield
steps.xpnsdvtd: In the next area with the dogs and crossbow enemies, grab the @large-soul-of-an-unknown-traveler from a ledge
steps.11pzkxmd: Continue on and light the Cleansing Chapel bonfire inside the chapel. There is also the @notched-whip in the corner
steps.1r5kjzow: Grab the @estus-shard right outside the Cleansing Chapel bonfire where enemies are praying near an obelisk
steps.mqz998nq: Instead of heading up the steps past the obelisk, head right and drop down a couple of cliffs into a lower, water-filled area. Head forward a bit to grab the @saint-tree-bellvine from a stump on the right. Remember you can hold a torch to get rid of leeches
steps.tr16whd2: Continue down the waterway and head up the steps at the end. From the top of the steps, there will be a @titanite-shard to your right and a Crystal Lizard in front of you which will drop a @twinkling-titanite when killed
steps.wuxu6aur: Farther down the path you'll encounter another Crystal Lizard which will drop another @twinkling-titanite. If you head up the stone steps near where the lizard was sitting initially, you can grab another @titanite-shard
steps.x608urg8: From here, you can drop down to where the @ravenous-crystal-lizard is sleeping and kill it for a @titanite-scale
steps.b1gx5ud3: Near where the Ravenous Crystal Lizard was sleeping, you'll find a narrow path between the buildings which leads to the @poisonbite-ring
steps.n8f25pqt: Turn around and head back outside and continue straight up a set of steps. Here you'll be able to grab a @titanite-shard from a window and drop back down to the Cleansing Chapel bonfire
steps.ncxyb3zl: Head back out past the obelisk with the praying enemies and head up the steps into the graveyard. Take your first left and stay left to reach the @astora-greatsword
steps.5hldhp6c: Turn around from the previous item and head straight until you reach a T-intersection. Head left, drop off, and follow the path to the end to drop down in an area with a @fading-soul and the @executioners-greatsword
steps.k355aq7c: Turn around and head out of this circular area, turning left when you can and crossing a bridge. Head up a set of steps, fight the @cathedral-grave-warden, and head down more steps to the right to an area riddled with large arrows. Here you can pick up an @undead-bone-shard, @repair-powder[Repair Powder x3], a @young-white-branch, another @young-white-branch, a @large-soul-of-an-unknown-traveler, and finally another @large-soul-of-an-unknown-traveler
steps.q4g751wh: Head back up to where you fought the Cathedral Grave Warden, and head up the set of steps and turn right towards a tower. You can find a @titanite-shard to the left of the tower. Inside, grab the @curse-ward-greatshield, head downstairs, and create another shortcut by kicking down the ladder
steps.pgur4s7h: Head back up and out and towards the cathedral's main double doors. Head left first and roll through some crates to find @rusted-coin[Rusted Coin x2]
steps.b52xjaw8: Heading right from the double doors, you'll find a corpse with a @red-bug-pellet
steps.cdscuvt7: Continue on across the narrow roof (watching out for ambushes) and grab the @large-soul-of-an-unknown-traveler from the other side
steps.fvihx2qe: You'll come across a few crossbow-wielding enemies in a lower area a bit farther on. Head down and kill them, then jump over onto the next buttress leading up. From above you can get the drop on a group of Thralls lying in ambush on the nearby roof. After expunging them, jump attack the other Thrall hanging on the wall, landing you right on top of @red-bug-pellet[Red Bug Pellet x3]. At the other end of this walkway you'll find @undead-hunter-charm[Undead Hunter Charm x3]
steps.vexa5oh2: Head back to the lower area where you fought the crossbow-wielding enemies. Continue down the path and take a left into a room where you can grab a @soul-of-a-nameless-soldier. (Watch out for another Thrall ambush)
steps.6x3fyj2p: Head back outside and continue around the perimeter of the cathedral until you reach a dead end with an @ember
steps.hh42itw4: Turn around and head back a short way to open a set of double doors which lead into the cathedral. Head left once inside and grab the @duel-charm from in front of a poison-spewing statue
steps.xwmik0uj: Continue through a dining room until you reach a lift which you can take to open a shortcut to the Cleansing Chapel bonfire. Head back up the lift and take notice of the enemy lurking above before taking the long set of steps (to the right of the balcony) down to grab a @deep-gem
steps.pxcfnvdy: Head back up and out onto the balcony. Run around the perimeter, optionally killing the giant (he's easier to kill from the area below), and grab the @soul-of-a-nameless-soldier, @lloyds-sword-ring, and @exploding-bolt[Exploding Bolt x8] (or save them for later if the giant is giving you trouble)
steps.50g71oj6: Head through the door at the other end of the balcony. Take the first left and head across a bridge-like platform (watching out for Thralls and ceiling slimes) and grab the @seek-guidance miracle
steps.229p8y5b: Head back across the bridge and up the ladder to grab an @ember
steps.r3nic9sg: From here, drop back down to the balcony where the giant attacked and head down the steps again. This time, head straight down to reach a room with a Mimic. Kill (or charm) it for the @deep-braille-divine-tome. Remember, giving this to Irina and buying any of the spells it unlocks will lock you into the bad ending of her quest. I recommend saving this for Karla, unless you really want some of the spells
steps.du0agxcw: From the Mimic, head down more steps and continue straight to a room with a @deep-accursed that drops @aldrichs-sapphire upon death. There is also an @ember in this room
steps.ef6snzdi: Head back to the previous room and turn right to head through a door and up some steps. If you are embered, @longfinger-kirk will invade your world. He drops @barbed-straight-sword + @spiked-shield
steps.mppr0ek1: Kill the giant if you haven't already (the one in the larger open area) and grab the @soul-of-a-nameless-soldier and the @maiden-set
steps.2axuh4w6: Open the double doors next to where the giant was, head down some steps, and open another set of doors. Out here you can pick up the @saint-bident and @homeward-bone[Homeward Bone x2]
steps.i94gyjze: Head back up through both doors and walk forward through the water until you can turn left up some steps. You'll find a @large-soul-of-an-unknown-traveler against the wall
steps.zml21mx2: Travel over to the other end of the large, open, water-filled area to the other giant. Kill this one and the slimes around him, and you'll be able to grab a @pale-tongue, the @drang-armor-set, and the @drang-hammers
steps.ze6wtap8: Head up the steps behind where the giant was sitting, kill the enemies around the shrine, and grab the @ember from the ledge that overlooks the water-filled area
steps.j8hgasoj: The @ring-of-the-evil-eye[Ring of the Evil Eye+1] is behind the shrine
steps.takn46ud: If you turn to face the giant shrine, you should see a door to your left. Head through and you'll reach some double doors that open back out to a previous area (near the graveyard). Staying inside the cathedral, continue past these doors to reach Siegward (if he is not here, follow the first part of the next step). Grab @duel-charm[Duel Charm x3] to the right of him. (Note: If you've already gone to the upper rafters where you drop down to Rosaria, the following encounter will not occur)
steps.0k2o3s9p: If Siegward is not there, leave the Cathedral completely (go to Firelink Shrine and come back) and then head back into the Cathedral through the large blue double doors you just opened. You will notice that a new bridge has been activated and Siegward is standing next to it. Talk to him and then cross the bridge to trigger a cutscene where it is revealed it was really Patches. Depending on if you killed the Giants or not, you'll either have to fight one or nothing happens
steps.m54c89mh: After being lowered, turn directly around and head through the door that's directly underneath the area Patches was standing. Head through a door and down several sets of steps to open the final shortcut to the Cleansing Chapel bonfire
steps.u66zbteh: As you head back through the shortcut you just opened, you should notice another door on your left immediately after you leave the chapel. Open it to reveal a lift, which will take you up to an area where you can climb a ladder to an enemy that drops the @deep-ring when killed
steps.8bi1cj73: You can drop onto a new roof through the hole in the wall just past the enemy you just killed. Head up the roof, turn right, and begin heading down this long roof. Eventually you'll be able to turn right and head down another roof to reach an @arbalest. Head back up to the long roof and head to the end to grab a @pale-tongue
steps.u26jibe0: The @ring-of-favor[Ring of Favor+2] is at the very opposite end
steps.913fxllu: Turn around from the Pale Tongue location and head back down the long roof. Eventually, you'll be able to turn right and head back inside to the rafters of the cathedral. Head right first and grab the @blessed-gem near the wall
steps.yc3895bh: Zig-zag your way across the rafters towards the other end, sticking primarily to the right. Eliminate the knight with the crossbow and drop down near where he was standing to a platform with a couple of candelabras. Drop again and you'll find yourself back with Patches. He will be waiting here and pretend to not be responsible for what just happened. Tell him "You know who I am" to receive the Prostration gesture. You can speak with him again for a @rusted-coin. You can then buy @catarina-set[Siegward's Armor Set] from him. (Note: Purchasing this armor means Patches will not be a rescue option for Greirat later in Irithyll of the Boreal Valley)
steps.gup2kind: Before leaving this area, continue on up the nearby stairs. Kill all the enemies and the non-agressive one will drop the @red-sign-soapstone. Continue on and you'll eventually find yourself at the Rosaria's Bed Chamber bonfire. Speak with Rosaria to obtain the @rosarias-fingers covenant. For now, do not offer her any Pale Tongues if you intend to do Sirris' quest line. We'll continue this side quest closer to the end of the game
steps.7bsfdc9t: If you killed Longfinger Kirk when he invaded earlier, you can grab the @armor-of-thorns-set nearby
steps.1f0jz9tw: If Patches didn't spawn at the Cathedral, return to Firelink Shrine and purchase the Tower Key if you haven't already and head into the Tower behind Firelink Shrine now. As you ascend the lift to the top, you'll hear a door shut behind you. Grab the @fire-keeper-soul at the top, if you haven't before, and then come back down to encounter Patches. He has locked the door and you'll need to drop down from the bridge onto coffins to escape
steps.0xc9q93z: Head back to the Tower and get to the bridge that overlooks Firelink Shrine. Drop down onto the roof and move around the roof until you find some windows you can go through. An @estus-shard will be on the rafters (you may have done this already in the Firelink Shrine section)
steps.1ydxvmq0: While on the roof, you can hear @pickle-pee-pump-a-rum-crow[Pickle-Pee, Pump-a-Rum] crow. Trading a @homeward-bone will get you the Call Over gesture and the @iron-bracelets (you may have done this already in the Firelink Shrine section). For the other trade options see the #[Misc] page
steps.o0iw3fqv: With the Fire Keeper Soul, you can heal Dark Sigils that you have in order to completely get rid of your Hollowing Level. If you are following Yoel/Yuria's quest line, however, don't do this until the postgame or you'll end up angering Yoel/Yuria
steps.ckg3f1rh: Refresh Firelink Shrine and head to the upper right to find Patches now located there. He'll ask for forgiveness; refuse to receive the Prostration gesture and a @rusted-gold-coin. You can then buy Siegward's Armor Set from him. Leaving Firelink Shrine and returning will allow Patches to be in his squatting position. Interact with him to receive the Patches Squat gesture
steps.b3bwfow7: If you can't buy Siegward's Armor Set yet, head to the Cleansing Chapel and check the well at the entrance, where Siegward should trapped. After speaking to him, return to whatever location Patches is at for you and buy the armor
steps.i3oo9m7p: Return to the well Siegward is in and throw his armor down to him to receive the Rejoice gesture
steps.z959073u: Head back up the steps past where you defeated the second giant. Turn right at the giant shrine. If you are embered, you can summon @anri-of-astora and @horace-the-hushed (both behind the shrine) as well as @sirris-of-the-sunless-realms (before the fog door). Defeat the @deacons-of-the-deep and you'll receive @small-doll + @soul-of-the-deacons-of-the-deep
steps.gr6g39ta: Rest at the bonfire so you can pick up the @archdeacon-set near the altar

steps.g6v1k3u9: After defeating the Deacons of the Deep, return to Firelink Shrine to find Anri and Horace. Talk to Anri to progress the questline
steps.dko91cv0: Farron Keep is a poisonous swamp, hence it might be a good idea to buy a few Purple Moss Clumps from the Shrine Handmaid. In addition, any item with the Quickstep weapon art (such as the Dagger, also sold by the Handmaid) could be useful as well since it allows you to move unimpeded through the deeper sections of the swamp
steps.m1ef5sqe: Leave the bonfire and enter Farron Keep proper. Turn right and in the back corner you will find @purple-moss-clump[Purple Moss Clump x3]. Continue into the swamp from there to find @iron-flesh between some trees
steps.aqpyrqei: Optionally, and only if you are on bad terms with Yuria (healed the Dark Sigil or attacked her) and are embered, head further into the deep swamp on the right. Dark spirit @londor-pale-shade will invade your world among the Basilisks there. If you kill him, you will receive the @manikin-claws
steps.johd0ge5: The @magic-stoneplate-ring[Magic Stoneplate Ring+1] is also in the deep swamp here
steps.o66qs33e: Head back to the Farron Keep bonfire, turn left this time and in the back corner you will find @ragged-mask surrounded by slugs
steps.5g3b4oey: To the right you will see a @titanite-shard in the swamp
steps.pr13n6rw: Turn right, head around the island, and in front of the partially sunken stone tower you will find an @estus-shard
steps.gfzn4r9g: To the left and past a large fire you'll see a @titanite-shard before the steps leading up
steps.wi09vavg: Instead of taking these steps, turn left once more to find @prism-stone[Prism Stone x10] on a corpse on an island
steps.xk2lwcn5: Farther out (closer to the stone wall) you will find @stone-parma
steps.jtxjokrs: From there go in direction of the rock wall on the right to find @rotten-pine-resin[Rotten Pine Resin x4] against a tree
steps.ojjndqkn: Follow this rocky wall to the left to reach a small structure guarded by a darkwraith. The @sages-coal is on a body inside this structure, granting you Crystal, Blessed, and Deep infusions
steps.gxowxfcp: Continue on, sticking closely to the rock wall on your right until it opens to some steps, which you follow up. Go through the archway and interact with the first altar (on your left) to extinguish the flame
steps.5vgddg9d: Go back through the archway and pick up @rotten-pine-resin[Rotten Pine Resin x2] ahead, then go back down the steps on this side
steps.14dl4z1m: As you arrive at the bottom of the steps, continue straight on into the deeper swamp until you find yourself between two ramp-like segments of a sunken bridge
steps.0ivm0icg: Ascend the one on your right for @purple-moss-clump[Purple Moss Clump x4]
steps.ape9x1ie: Turn around, cross over to the other ramp, and pick up the @greatsword
steps.qhn3dooh: From there, look left to locate a stone pillar, behind which you pick up a @titanite-shard
steps.jfvjm9tq: Looking at the fire from there, head to your right towards the rock wall and follow that to the next fire to discover a set of steps as well as another @titanite-shard. (If you stay back as far as possible while picking it up, the @ghru-leaper on the other island should not notice you)
steps.5c5ou0zx: Head up and stick to the right to find @purple-moss-clump[Purple Moss Clump x2] between two trees
steps.sacybapa: Snuff out the flame on the second altar
steps.w94wl8il: The @dark-stoneplate-ring[Dark Stoneplate Ring+2] is behind the wall
steps.3ncuw33a: Cross the bridge with the three Ghrus to find the Keep Ruins bonfire
steps.5xdv53uz: The @wolf-ring[Wolf Ring+1] is outside near the wall of this building
steps.s0kdl0gj: Go down the ramp on the other side and enter the round structure to the right, where you will find an @undead-bone-shard amidst some slugs
steps.0vxne7f7: From the other side of this structure you can see a ladder surrounded by slugs. Go a bit past this ladder for now and pick up @wolfs-blood-swordgrass at the foot of the tower
steps.4uuhxeaz: Step onto the nearby island to find a cauldron of Estus Soup as well as the @sunlight-talisman
steps.gc3n64e2: Return to the ladder you just passed and climb it
steps.peduye9d: Once you reach the top, go right (don't enter the tower) to find a Crystal Lizard on the other side who drops a @twinkling-titanite
steps.g34bfq58: From the lizard go back from where you came and just before the stairs turn right to find an illusionary wall (look for an archway on the wall). Behind it you will find @dreamchasers-ashes
steps.sg0lincn: Enter the room to find the Old Wolf of Farron and his bonfire. Interact with the wolf to receive the Legion Etiquette gesture and join the @watchdogs-of-farron covenant
steps.0u7j72m5: Return to Firelink Shrine and give the Dreamchaser's Ashes to the Shrine Handmaid. Reload the area and Sirris will once again be there. Talk to her to receive the Darkmoon Loyalty gesture
steps.q4893ui0: Warp back to the Old Wolf of Farron bonfire and go up the tower with the elevator
steps.ura3k8t0: Turn right and on the top you can fight a @stray-demon to obtain @soul-of-a-stray-demon
steps.g450d3uc: Around the Stray Demon you will find a @greataxe, an @ember, and another @ember
steps.c04dh0gn: Turn around and move towards the gate. Just before and to the right of the gate is a spot where you can drop down. Do so and move along, dropping down a few ledges
steps.r8uls6f8: After getting to the other side of the gate go left and up to find a Crystal Lizard who drops a @heavy-gem
steps.7a11mid1: There are two Crystal Lizards before the dead dragon who both drop a @large-titanite-shard
steps.bhcc7w1x: In front of the dragon you can also find @lightning-spear
steps.k57czft3: Right next to it is the @dragon-crest-shield
steps.kwmloihk: Go back to the ladder that led up the tower and go down. (Note: If you don't want to use a Homeward Bone you can go back by going up the gate and dropping down to the other side)
steps.z62db2z3: Facing away from the ladder, proceed to a small island with a @titanite-shard next to a fire
steps.wcc9xep5: From the next small island with a fire, make a quick detour to the left where the @nameless-knight-set is stashed between a tower and a rock wall. (Going there may trigger an invasion by Yellowfinger Heysel, but she spawns out of immediate reach on the other side of the tower)
steps.h7aw8ci2: Up next is @titanite-shard[Titanite Shard x2] in front of a tree. (If the Elder Ghru in the area is giving you trouble, you can try luring him into one of the fires for some extra damage)
steps.r7r062n2: Keep heading closely along the rocks on your left until you reach a way up. (If dark spirit Yellowfinger Heysel is already in your world, you might encounter her in the area upstairs)
steps.92nb3yvs: Go up to the altar and extinguish the last of the three flames. To the right, on the other side of the small stone wall, you'll find a @rusted-gold-coin
steps.gdqxdtgg: Go through the archway on the left to find @homeward-bone[Homeward Bone x2]
steps.gqeqivlw: Head up the steps, fight the Ghru Leaper (if you sprint up, you should be able to backstab him), and go down on the other side. If not triggered previously, @yellowfinger-heysel will invade you here, provided you are embered. If this is your first time defeating her, you'll gain @heysel-pick + @xanthous-crown
steps.yavel974: In the swamp area below, you will encounter some @basilisk[Basilisks]. If you want to beef up your curse resistance, equip Archdeacon Set and Maiden Gloves
steps.yja40obs: Take a right at the bottom of the steps and then enter an alcove on your left with a @large-soul-of-a-nameless-soldier
steps.lsp5wvy8: Turn around and head to the other side of the steps. Tucked away in the dead end between rocks and tower is another @large-soul-of-a-nameless-soldier
steps.1ktpy6to: Turn around yet again and make your way across an island. To the right between two rock formations you can find @repair-powder[Repair Powder x4]
steps.q1n3drgg: Go right into a cave, where you will find the @golden-scroll
steps.gv83tlp1: Make sure to give this scroll to Orbeck at Firelink Shrine to keep him from leaving (it doesn't have to be the Golden Scroll in particular, but this is the first one available)
steps.pvf0fqac: Right next to the scroll is the @antiquated-set in a chest
steps.lxnaqrg1: Warp (or walk straight along the outer walls) to the Keep Ruins bonfire. Standing at the top of the ramp leading down from there, drop off to the left, directly onto a @titanite-shard
steps.zvo9bio4: From here you will see a Great Crab and a white birch when looking towards the wall. Kill the crab for the @lingering-dragoncrest-ring. (Lure the crab close to the white birch tree and the Giant of the Undead Settlement will assist you using his greatarrows)
steps.ljyaw4op: Around this area you will find @gold-pine-bundle[Gold Pine Bundle x6], an @ember, a @large-soul-of-an-unknown-traveler, a @soul-of-a-nameless-soldier, a @young-white-branch, another @young-white-branch, and the @crown-of-dusk
steps.41ac13i9: Follow the wall to your right and you'll eventually find the @sages-scroll, guarded by Ghrus near several dead mushrooms
steps.1krqdf0y: If you continue in the same direction along the wall you will encounter three Elder Ghrus. Lure these enemies out one by one to get @black-bow-of-pharis and @phariss-hat. In the middle you can find a @poison-gem. (If you do not wish to engage the Elder Ghrus in melee, you can instead whittle them down using ranged weapons from up by the Keep Ruins bonfire)
steps.pge77q0h: Warp (or backtrack) to the Keep Ruins bonfire, go down the ramp and through the opened gate. Straight ahead is a @shriving-stone
steps.hlo619pr: Follow the path and once you're in an open area turn right and enter the structure to get to the Farron Keep Perimeter bonfire
steps.i7gyrda5: Take the path farther into the structure to encounter a Ravenous Crystal Lizard who drops @titanite-scale[Titanite Scale x2]
steps.moi1080f: Right next to him is the @great-magic-weapon sorcery
steps.savq0rsn: Open the shortcut back to the Road of Sacrifices
steps.b35qomi1: Turn around and go back in direction of the bonfire. After the first set of stairs you can go through the broken wall on the left and drop down
steps.4ahg9chl: Here you can find @atonement and on the right side of the cliff you can find a @hollow-gem
steps.giusi8qi: If you want to be able to access @yuria-of-londor and the Usurpation of Fire ending, make sure that, before proceeding to fight the Abyss Watchers, you have Drawn Out True Strength 5 times with Yoel and then reload Firelink Shrine so that Yoel dies and Yuria appears. You can talk to her to receive the Dignified Bow gesture and buy the @londor-braille-divine-tome
steps.ujo1o900: Before fighting the Abyss Watchers, remember to give Orbeck the @golden-scroll and/or @sages-scroll
steps.p2xyitra: Buy Aural Decoy, Farron Flashsword, Pestilent Mist, and Spook from Orbeck. Then talk to him multiple times to obtain the @young-dragon-ring, the Silent Ally gesture, and the @slumbering-dragoncrest-ring
steps.gq7z0ugp: Go back to the Farron Keep Perimeter bonfire and leave the building
steps.3jjr69fc: To the right of the Ghrus you can find an @ember
steps.mw5f8qn4: Go up the right side and on the hill you will find @black-bug-pellet[Black Bug Pellet x3]
steps.jr0goscw: You can summon @yellowfinger-heysel in Farron Keep right after the Keep Ruins bonfire, but only if you have offered a Pale Tongue to Rosaria, which will block you out of Sirris' quest line, so I recommend saving this part for another playthrough. You'll gain the Proper Bow gesture after her summon
steps.1um1b1sa: @black-hand-gotthard can be summoned and will grant you the By My Sword gesture. His summon sign is up the first set of stairs
steps.c88fzi3p: @sirris-of-the-sunless-realms[Sirris] can also be summoned here. Her sign is to the left of the mausoleum entrance
steps.wulwylbz: If you are on good terms with Yuria, you can also summon the @londor-pale-shade and gain the Duel Bow gesture. His summon sign is right next to the Farron Keep Perimeter bonfire. (Note: In order to be able to summon two phantoms at the same time, you have to use @dried-finger. Black Hand Gotthard and Londor Pale Shade can also be summoned for another later fight, so don't worry about getting all the gestures here at once)
steps.gx0mxnbv: If you have collected all the items around the three white birch trees so far, you'll find the @hawk-ring back where the giant was in Undead Settlement

steps.e4casieb: Return to Firelink Shrine and talk with Hawkwood to receive the @farron-ring. (If Hawkwood isn't sitting on the stairs inside the Shrine, reload the area until he does)
steps.xku4hq8p: Reload the area, and Hawkwood should no longer be present. @hawkwoods-shield will be on the ground by a gravestone outside of Firelink Shrine, near where the dog spawns
steps.swy8lihd: Eygon of Carim should also now be in Firelink Shrine. Exhaust his dialogue now so he is available for a boss fight later on
steps.7x8csr2i: Warp back to the Abyss Watchers bonfire, enter the Catacombs of Carthus and on the left side you'll find @carthus-rouge[Carthus Rouge x2]
steps.t0s3ibh5: The @ring-of-steel-protection[Ring of Steel Protection+2] is on a pillar below the bridge
steps.8owspgd0: After crossing the bridge, go up the stairs to the left and then immediately turn around to your right. There is @soul-of-a-nameless-soldier at the end of the way
steps.zl4azck5: Turn back the other way, and follow the path down a ladder. At the bottom you'll find another @soul-of-a-nameless-soldier
steps.x9d5jbsf: Follow the path and in the room with the pillars strike the wall on the right side to reveal an illusory wall. Behind it you'll find the @carthus-pyromancy-tome
steps.sllr7egq: Back in the pillar room you can find a @sharp-gem on the right side
steps.p3a6wyy0: In the next room you'll find @titanite-shard[Titanite Shard x2] in the leftmost corner
steps.uhngx1tq: Before heading down the giant staircase that a skeleton ball will eventually begin to roll up and down, there will be a hallway to the left you can take. Head down this way and you'll eventually run into Anri, who claims to be looking for Horace. Exhaust the dialogue
steps.pwgj8lv6: Head out onto the platform next to Anri, kill a Crystal Lizard for a @twinkling-titanite, and grab @bloodred-moss-clump[Bloodred Moss Clump x3] on the right side
steps.5q9d5w2u: Go back to the giant staircase and on the left side is an @ember
steps.env6cni8: Once arriving at the bottom of the giant staircase, you'll notice a skeleton with a hat on its head hiding right in the corner of the next room. Kill it and the next time the skeleton ball hits the bottom gate, it'll explode and reveal an @undead-bone-shard
steps.kmlcyls1: In the next hallway you can find the @carthus-milkring on the right side behind some big vases
steps.24bk87sd: The @thunder-stoneplate-ring[Thunder Stoneplate Ring+1] is also between these vases
steps.idbfyu47: On the corpse in the bone-ridden hallway is a @large-soul-of-an-unknown-traveler. At the end of the hallway is an @ember. (Be careful, there is a hole in the ground)
steps.p2ckgxnc: In the corner where the second skeleton ball spawns is a @large-titanite-shard
steps.oh8vatht: Activate the Catacombs of Carthus bonfire in the left hallway
steps.8ilbvrwh: Go down the stairs, turn right and right again to get to a hallway with @skeleton-wheel[Skeleton Wheels]. On the left wall is @titanite-shard[Titanite Shard x2]
steps.4rx9mckz: At the end of the hallway you will find the @carthus-bloodring
steps.snw5jiue: Go back to the main room to find @titanite-shard[Titanite Shard x2] on a corpse that is lying by a pillar
steps.r86086cz: To the right of the corpse is an illusory wall. Hit it and go up the stairs to find the @grave-wardens-ashes
steps.5rhpj3m7: Turn around and go towards the other side, finding a @large-titanite-shard on the right side
steps.g5py9o0l: Kill the skeleton with the hat and the skeleton ball will break revealing a @dark-gem
steps.7jcx6lk0: Stay on the second level and you'll find @carthus-rouge[Carthus Rouge x3] next to the archer skeleton
steps.ygtwu5j7: Go down to the pillar room and head inside the tunnel just past the illusory wall to find a Crystal Lizard who drops a @fire-gem
steps.o8d454qz: Exit the tunnel to find @yellow-bug-pellet[Yellow Bug Pellet x3] on the left side
steps.bzzo25fd: Go to the gate with the skeletons to find a @large-soul-of-a-nameless-soldier and @black-bug-pellet[Black Bug Pellet x2]
steps.hv3y4p2t: Open the gate and get the @ember on the other side
steps.hr1cjzmk: Go through the tunnel that leads to the main pillar room. If you're embered, you'll be invaded by @knight-slayer-tsorig. Regardless of who wins the fight, you will receive the My Thanks! gesture. Defeating him will grant you the @knight-slayers-ring
steps.vrkbl6qc: Turn around and just before the bridge go right and follow the path to Anri. Once again you'll be asked whether you have found Horace. You haven't yet, but we're about to. Be sure to exhaust the dialogue
steps.2nwhw572: Get down to the left of Anri and follow to the path the next boss
steps.ftwncnql: During the battle you had an opportunity to grab the @grave-warden-pyromancy-tome, but should you have not picked it up then it can now be found in the far left corner of the goblet room. Cornyx can't read this pyromancy tome, so you'll have to wait until you free Karla to turn it in

steps.mp2kve1l: From the High Lord Wolnir bonfire go back to the bridge and hit the supports to create a ladder
steps.f15q2v7l: Head down to find a room with a @demon who drops a @soul-of-a-demon after killing him
steps.t8b2knib: In the same room on the top level is a Mimic which drops the @black-blade
steps.ok51jc9p: Go down the stairs to find @large-titanite-shard and @large-soul-of-a-nameless-soldier
steps.6k4gcxh7: Go down the stairs to find @old-sages-blindfold + @witchs-ring
steps.vk3emxb9: When heading towards the Old Demon King fog door, a Carthus Sandworm will appear out of the ground. Align the worm between the ballista and yourself, such that the ballista kills the worm while you are standing in a terrain safe spot. You'll gain @lightning-stake + @undead-bone-shard
steps.g16liacd: Around the front part of the lake you will find the @shield-of-want as well as 5 pickups containing one @large-titanite-shard each
steps.1qts11j6: Obtain the @speckled-stoneplate-ring which is located on a corpse in Smouldering Lake behind a brick wall. Go along the left wall when looking from the fog door to find the wall. You will need to trick the ballista into destroying the brick wall
steps.1ddhu8m1: Follow the left wall farther into the lake to find a @chaos-gem and around the middle of the lake you will see a brick floor; stand on it to trick the ballista into destroying the floor to unlock a shortcut but do not decend into it
steps.dlg8j5dj: Go up the slope to the right of the fog door for another @large-titanite-shard as well as the Demon Ruins bonfire down the stairs
steps.j59k05yy: On the top floor go into the left corner to find an @ember
steps.a0sicy24: Go right and fight some Grus to find an @ember. From here you can see an item, an @estus-shard. It's not recommended to jump for it, we'll get it later
steps.b6miu3oi: Head back into the first room, go down the stairs and in the back left you'll find another @undead-bone-shard
steps.peh73e46: In this room take the left hallway on the other side (not the one with the rat). Hit the illusory wall at the end and pick up the @black-knight-sword
steps.nkj518f5: The @flame-stoneplate-ring[Flame Stoneplate Ring+2] is in a corner
steps.poh3pdyp: Go out, right and follow this way until you get to a room with some stairs. Take a left before the stairs, then right to find an @ember. Now go up the stairs to find the Old King's Antechamber bonfire
steps.sl6ms4zp: From the bonfire go into the nearest hallway and follow the right path until you find a Crystal Lizard who drops a @chaos-gem
steps.q15wy055: Take the straight path from the Old King's Antchechamber bonfire and you'll find the @izalith-pyromancy-tome on the ground
steps.6w51p6cd: In the Old King's Antechamber there is an illusory wall to the right of the stairs in the corner. Activate it and then move down the hallway that has loads of Writhing Rotten Flesh enemies on the ceiling and grab the @estus-shard on a body at the end
steps.1q3fwu2l: Turn around and take the left to get back into the main room. From here go into the hallway that is in the left corner (the one with the rat)
steps.p2prisns: Take the right before the rat, hit the illusory wall straight ahead. Take a left and pick up the @quelana-pyromancy-tome. Only Karla can read this tome
steps.v3pacthy: In the lava-filled room right next to the tome you can find @toxic-mist and @white-hair-talisman
steps.tl73i6av: Head back and keep on taking right turns until you reach a hallway downstairs with a big rat. Reveal an illusory wall on the left side of this hallway and grab @large-titanite-shard[Large Titanite Shard x3] from a chest
steps.j2ucat35: Behind the chest is another illusory wall. Drop down a ledge to get the @izalith-staff
steps.8tg5lnxn: In the room with the Basilisks is a @titanite-scale
steps.jmgvrcah: Before going up the stairs take a left when you get to them and you'll encounter @knight-slayer-tsorig. Regardless of who wins the fight, you will receive the My Thanks! gesture (if you haven't gotten it before). After killing him, he will drop @fume-ultra-greatsword + @black-iron-greatshield. If this is your first time defeating him, he will drop the @knight-slayers-ring as well. Also, the @black-iron-set can be obtained via the @shrine-handmaid
steps.jfvkx9dt: In this lava room you can get @sacred-flame and an @ember
steps.23ip7krb: Go back to the stairs and cross the bridge for a @soul-of-a-crestfallen-knight
steps.9ubtnlmg: Go up the ladder, then another ladder and drop down to the right to find the @dragonrider-bow
steps.xtt60oeg: Exit the tunnel at the top to get back to the Smouldering Lake. Drop down on the left to find @homeward-bone[Homeward Bone x2] next to the wall
steps.1m358si8: The @bloodbite-ring[Bloodbite Ring+1] is near the ballista
steps.qxdreiq8: After shutting off the ballista, you'll notice some cliffs that you can drop onto that will eventually lead you back to the lake. You'll also land right in front of a cave you haven't explored (you can also get here just by running to the right from the Abandoned Tomb bonfire). Head inside to find two Crystal Lizards who drop @twinkling-titanite and @titanite-chunk
steps.4ew6br47: You'll also find Horace, who has succumbed to his Dark Sigils and become hostile. Kill him and he'll drop the @llewellyn-shield. The Shrine Handmaid will also now sell Horace's @executioner-set[Executioner's Armor Set]
steps.3oxdph2o: Inside here you will also find @yellow-bug-pellet[Yellow Bug Pellet x2], a @large-titanite-shard, and another @large-titanite-shard
steps.zcxurwdr: If you killed Horace but have not yet defeated High Lord Wolnir, you can go back to the Catacombs and speak with Anri above the wooden bridge. Tell of the Smouldering Lake and you'll be given the @ring-of-the-evil-eye. If Wolnir has already been destroyed, Anri will be gone from the Catacombs and you will be given the ring on your next meeting in Irithyll of the Boreal Valley
steps.lcdzh4co: Before fighting the Old Demon King you can summon Knight Slayer Tsorig (next to the Demon Ruins bonfire, if you defeated him in Catacombs of Carthus) and Great Swamp Cuculus (in front of the fog door). If the Great Swamp Cuculus survives the fight, go back to the cage in Undead Settlement you found Cornyx in to receive @spotted-whip + @cornyxs-set

steps.r5ct5fsi: When first arriving in Irithyll, you'll battle one of @sulyvahns-beast[Sulyvahn's Beasts], which drops @pontiffs-right-eye, and then move through a force field to the Central Irithyll bonfire. If you run past the beast, it will despawn and you will encounter it later in a more challenging area. Light the bonfire and return to the middle of the bridge and Sirris' summon sign should be there if you've been following her quest. Activate it and you'll enter her world and have to fight @creighton-the-wanderer. After defeating the invader, visit Firelink Shrine and she will give you @mail-breaker[Blessed Mail Breaker] + @silvercat-ring for the troubles
steps.4z2bu6qi: Just before the barrier you will find one @homeward-bone
steps.aev8ofz8: Around the fountain you can find @large-soul-of-a-nameless-soldier, @rime-blue-moss-clump, and @soul-of-a-weary-warrior
steps.mi94gfws: Go up the stairs and to the left on the railing is a @soul-of-a-weary-warrior
steps.7ncwtuwg: Going straight and up the two stairs to the right is a @large-titanite-shard
steps.t44sca4h: On the fountain up ahead are @budding-green-blossom and @large-soul-of-a-nameless-soldier
steps.f2vxwg5m: A bit farther and to the left next to a tree is @rime-blue-moss-clump[Rime-blue Moss Clump x2]
steps.fdgwfycy: Go up to the @burning-stake-witch[Fire Witch] to get the @large-titanite-shard
steps.dkeh34yq: To the left of the main road is a Crystal Lizard who drops a @twinkling-titanite
steps.sootkh6m: Attack the railing to the right of the lizard to reveal a staircase. Go down and to the right is a @large-titanite-shard
steps.o2ynu850: Kill the Evangelist in the area below for @dorhys-gnawing
steps.rzqpn9b5: Pick up the @witchtree-branch, open the gate, and go back to where the lizard was
steps.1gp15wnk: Just before the crossroads is a @large-soul-of-a-nameless-soldier
steps.dffh2lc8: Take the right here and pick up the @large-titanite-shard from a corpse
steps.h4imazee: Now take the left at the crossroads and before going up to the church is a @large-titanite-shard to the left
steps.onzeoids: Go upstairs and inside, light the Church of Yorshka bonfire, and pick up @proof-of-a-concord-kept from a corpse in the back
steps.nt2d2eq1: Anri will be in the same room. Exhaust the dialogue to receive the Quiet Resolve gesture. You will also be given the @ring-of-the-evil-eye if not obtained previously. Next is the major dividing point in Anri's story: From here on out, if you want to follow this quest line to its conclusion, follow Anri A. If you want the Usurpation of Fire ending, follow Anri B
steps.pojo3y8f: Anri A Progress: (Slayer of Aldrich Ending) Look towards the side of the room that has some stone statues. One of these is actually a pilgrim in disguise sent by Yuria. Slash away at the statues until you find him and make sure he's dead. He'll drop the @chameleon sorcery for you as well
steps.wris1y5b: Anri B Progress: (Lord of Hollows Ending) Do nothing in regards to the pilgrim
steps.bkns7j65: From the bonfire go down the stairs and turn right to find the @roster-of-knights. Go out onto the graveyard and look for a @fading-soul near the cliff. To the right near a tree is another @fading-soul
steps.bw3it8gd: In front of the large tombstone at the end of this path is @homeward-bone[Homeward Bone x3]
steps.nq6vq0l0: An @undead-bone-shard is located behind the grave. If you helped Sirris, @creighton-the-wanderer will invade you here if you're embered. Killing him will gain you the @dragonslayers-axe and allow you to grab Creighton's @mirrah-chain-set[Mirrah Chain Armor Set] on the bridge where you used Sirris' summon sign
steps.otr6au0y: From the entrance to the graveyard go down the stairs on the left and left again to get to @kukri[Kukri x8] and @rusted-gold-coin
steps.y0cr184g: Now take the other way to get to a dark room. On the ground level of this room is @blue-bug-pellet[Blue Bug Pellet x2]
steps.romg40wx: Up on the rafters is a @shriving-stone and in the chest on the mid level is @yorshkas-spear
steps.lffl1jvl: The @covetous-gold-serpent-ring[Covetous Gold Serpent Ring+1] is on a platform below the broken railing outside
steps.9wdn194r: Go down to the stairs and right just before the lake. The wall in the first right tunnel is an illusory wall with a Crystal Lizard behind it who drops @twinkling-titanite
steps.6fu26ylo: Past the other tunnel and next to the tree is a @blood-gem
steps.w0ebne5y: Jump into the lake from here for a @ring-of-sacrifice
steps.73v5op7p: In the lake you'll find a bundle of @green-blossom[Green Blossom x3], a @large-soul-of-a-nameless-soldier, the @great-heal miracle (it's on the right side of the lake that is below the entrance to Irithyll), another @green-blossom[Green Blossom x3] bundle, and finally an individual @green-blossom
steps.e1se5qps: Activate the Distant Manor bonfire while you're here, then head back upstairs
steps.u5kzf31w: Enter the sewers from the lake and pick up two droppings: @dung-pie[Dung Pie x3] and @dung-pie[Dung Pie x3]
steps.30ybeu74: In the corner opposite some stairs are the @excrement-covered-ashes
steps.0op7o8cq: Head up these stairs and you'll find @siegward-of-catarina hanging out by the fire. Exhaust his dialogue and you'll receive the @emit-force miracle, a @siegbrau, and any gestures you missed from his first encounter
steps.hfyeghtf: The first Silver Knight you encounter in the next room drops @large-titanite-shard + @divine-blessing. Head up the stairs on the left to find two more Silver Knights who both drop @large-titanite-shard[Large Titanite Shard x2] as well as three chests containing the @leo-ring, @smoughs-great-hammer, and a @divine-blessing
steps.lwrs3gse: The @wood-grain-ring[Wood Grain Ring+2] is outside in an alcove to the right
steps.c8cx05ku: If you are on bad terms with Yuria (healed the Dark Sigil or attacked her or killed the assassin in the Church of Yorshka) and are embered, dark spirit @londor-pale-shade will invade your world after the Silver Knights' room. (Note: If you are currently eligible for the invasion by @creighton-the-wanderer, you will have to eliminate that one first to get Londor Pale Shade to spawn.) If this is your first time killing him, you will receive the @manikin-claws. If you defeated @londor-pale-shade in both of his invasions, then you can pick up the @pale-shade-set near Yuria's location in Firelink Shrine
steps.3xnqbrdv: Next to the stairs here is a @large-soul-of-a-nameless-soldier and farther up on a railing is a @large-titanite-shard
steps.24rafwqv: You can take the elevator here and open the gate for a shortcut
steps.htzscpbu: In the next room up ahead you can find @blue-bug-pellet[Blue Bug Pellet x2] on a corpse and if you go down the ladder at the top you can find a @large-titanite-shard
steps.4dls3ce4: Go down the left side of the fog door and get the @ember from a corpse and open the shortcut
steps.s5z9zs8p: Go up to the fog door again and drop down to the altar for the @ring-of-the-suns-first-born and a @lightning-gem
steps.sqqhf1rn: The @chloranthy-ring[Chloranthy Ring+1] is behind the altar
steps.w3uzvyzn: The wall to the left of the altar (with your back to it) is an illusory wall with the @magic-clutch-ring behind it
steps.effbl82e: Turn around and take the exit opposite of you to get the @soul-of-a-weary-warrior from where the Fire Witch is as well as another @soul-of-a-weary-warrior above it
steps.o5ag0c5n: Return to Firelink Shrine and talk to @greirat-of-the-undead-settlement. He will ask to pillage Irithyll. Only do this after confirming Siegward is in Irithyll OR if Patches still has Siegward's armor. If you have neither, Greirat will perish and his ashes can be found in the sewer area
steps.nq7p8sfd: If you did not purchase Siegward's armor you can send Patches out to rescue Greirat. Refresh Firelink Shrine after sending Greirat out and Patches will ask you where he went. Tell him and Patches will head out to rescue Greirat
steps.v76aspj3: @black-hand-gotthard can be summoned for the Pontiff Sulyvahn fight. If this is the first time you've summoned him, you'll receive the By My Sword gesture
steps.gm5tm6du: If you are following the Yoel/Yuria quest line, you can summon the @londor-pale-shade. If this is the first time you've summoned them, you'll receive the Duel Bow gesture
steps.yl2k1lxt: @anri-of-astora can also be summoned instead of the Londor Pale Shade
steps.9cqnb1w9: Yuria/Anri B Progress: Head back to Firelink Shrine after defeating Pontiff and talk to Yuria and she'll discuss that the "marriage ceremony" is almost complete
steps.wganhlbq: Greirat should have also returned from his pillage
steps.nn0xz5mk: Go right after exiting from the Pontiff bonfire to find a @large-titanite-shard
steps.kmclcec6: In the same area are two Crystal Lizards who drop @twinkling-titanite
steps.7jtkqzs7: Go to the left of the courtyard and enter the dark section. At the back you'll find the @dark-stoneplate-ring
steps.y3xukjmw: Enter the cathedral from the top of the dark section, unlock an elevator shortcut back down to Sulyvahn's room, and cross the bridge to the other side to find a Mimic who has the @golden-ritual-spear
steps.f51ot06e: The @ring-of-favor[Ring of Favor+1] is at the other end
steps.0fdzyl6s: Cross the bridge and go around to the other side to find a Crystal Lizard who drops a @simple-gem
steps.eep811ax: Exit the same way you entered and go right to find a @large-titanite-shard on a corpse
steps.4396h19a: On the courtyard itself you can find a @soul-of-a-weary-warrior, a @large-titanite-shard, an @ember, and another @ember
steps.9qfhnyng: At the end of the courtyard are two NPCs and one of them drops the @drang-twinspears
steps.mpukw3in: Once you enter the building after the giant courtyard, there will be an illusory wall on the left side that reveals a long ladder down. Head down and defeat two of @sulyvahns-beast[Sulyvahn's Beasts] (killing them grants you the @ring-of-favor) and interact with @archdeacon-mcdonnell to gain the @aldrich-faithful covenant. You can also find @human-dregs, a @deep-gem, and the Water Reserve bonfire in this room
steps.6fqg4o4o: After going up the stairs in the building where the illusory wall was you can find a @titanite-scale on a corpse in one of the outside corners
steps.5dtz1968: On the right side of the right tower where you can walk up to the archers is a @large-titanite-shard
steps.gdzifzep: As you make your way up the building with the Silver Knight archers, you can drop down to a roof below and find the @easterners-ashes
steps.0ivmhzbb: Before you enter the hallway that leads to the lift turn around and walk down to the lower tower for a @large-titanite-shard and open the shortcut in the next tower
steps.vwacl2gu: As you walk back from the shortcut to the hallway you will see @dragonslayer-greatbow + @dragonslayer-greatarrow[Dragonslayer Greatarrow x5] on a lower platform
steps.v1ljexpm: Anri B Progress: Before activating the lift to Anor Londo, there is a path that goes down in the room before the lever. Here you'll find the pilgrim waiting for you. He'll give you the @sword-of-avowal and tell you Anri is waiting ahead. Head down, picking up the @brass-set along the way, to find Anri's body at the altar. Perform the Rite of Avowal and you'll gain 3 Dark Sigils, granting you the total amount of 8 Dark Sigils you need for the Usurpation of Fire ending. To the right of the altar, you will find the @reversal-ring. Revisit the pilgrim and you will discover he is now dead with the @chameleon sorcery on his body
steps.tvesd9hg: Anri B Progress: You can reload the area and pick up @anris-straight-sword from where Anri was lying
steps.aaqv3sgf: Anri A Progress: You will find an illusory wall where the path down to the altar would be. You can find the @brass-set and @reversal-ring in the same places

steps.7exnn4lc: Use the lift to reach the Anor Londo bonfire. Run back down the stairs and you'll be able to see a tower in the distance.
