Walk across the sky on an invisible floor (don't worry, you can't fall off at the sides) and continue walking straight until lined up with the tower, then walk towards it. You'll find @company-captain-yorshka who will allow you into the @blades-of-the-darkmoon covenant if you perform the Darkmoon Loyalty gesture
steps.3i3vvs8w: If you drop down the tower you can find @painting-guardians-curved-sword as well as the @painting-guardian-set. Warp back to the Anor Londo bonfire
steps.o3blmu1d: @havels-ring[Havel's Ring+2] can also be found in the tower
steps.ufhxujnz: Anri B Progress: If you didn't get it before, you can return to where Anri's body was to find @anris-straight-sword
steps.90v8m32g: On the left after going up the stairs to Anor Londo is a @large-soul-of-a-weary-warrior
steps.zn1vyvut: On the right platform with the red-eyed knight is a @soul-of-a-crestfallen-knight
steps.tr1f2lbm: Head left and you'll find the Giant Blacksmith's corpse with the @giants-coal by his body, granting you Lightning, Simple, and Chaos infusions
steps.nt3hwysu: After entering the main hall turn left and next to the Deacons is a @proof-of-a-concord-kept
steps.4ew579ju: On the other side you can find @moonlight-arrow[Moonlight Arrow x6]
steps.a5w92gp9: In the main room of the castle, you will be ambushed by a @deep-accursed enemy. Defeating him will provide you with @aldrichs-ruby
steps.vyddrh6y: Looking at the fog door you will find a chest on the left side, surrounded by @rotten-flesh-of-aldrich enemies, with an @estus-shard inside
steps.yjv3auta: Anri A Progress: If you killed Horace in Smouldering Lake, Anri's summoning sign will appear outside in front of the large, golden doors in Anor Londo. Using this sign will cause you to be summoned as a phantom to help kill Aldrich
steps.hgf7yctg: After defeating Aldrich, take the elevator up and you will discover the @sun-princess-ring in Gwynevere's Chamber
steps.e4w8upcx: Anri A Progress: Return to Firelink Shrine and talk to Ludleth who hands you @anris-straight-sword, which was left with him as a thanks to you
steps.h7gxoqup: Anri A Progress: Anri has also succumbed to the Dark Sigils and become hostile. If you told Anri of Horace's location in Smouldering Lake, go there. If not, go up the first set of stairs from the Cathedral of the Deep bonfire and take a right then follow the path up the hill. Killing Anri allows you to purchase the Elite Knight Armor Set from the Shrine Handmaid
steps.mvevq596: If you are following Sirris' quest and have defeated Aldrich, travel to Undead Settlement via either the Cliff Underside or Dilapidated Bridge bonfire and make your way back to the room before the Curse-rotted Greatwood fight. You will find Sirris' summon sign right before the giant hole that leads to the Pit of Hollows. You'll be summoned to fight @holy-knight-hodrick, who turns out to be Sirris' grandfather. After defeating Holy Knight Hodrick, you will gain the @mound-maker[Mound-makers] covenant (if not obtained before). The @sunset-armor-set will be available in the Pit of Hollows bonfire area and you will find the @sunset-shield on a grave at the cliff outside of Firelink Shrine (from the Iudex Gundyr bonfire go up the first set of stairs, then right)
steps.bt5kc99w: After defeating @holy-knight-hodrick, Sirris will return to Firelink Shrine and she will ask to be your knight. Agree and she'll be able to be summoned for the final three main boss fights of the game. Refuse and you'll find her hollow in the Pit of Hollows

steps.zoyg8uqp: Warp to the Distant Manor bonfire, follow the path down, and drop down immediately for a @rusted-gold-coin. Drop farther down to find a @large-titanite-shard behind a pillar
steps.ecmbs8f1: When you are outside on a cliffside path, @alva-seeker-of-the-spurned, will invade if you are embered. He drops the @murakumo when killed
steps.wzvd780j: The first cell on the left has a @rusted-coin in it
steps.4z6bt1vi: The second cell on the same side has a @large-titanite-shard
steps.8u891nr1: On the outer path is a @fading-soul
steps.ezrns7od: At the end of the path is a @large-titanite-shard
steps.neymo5y1: Drop down to the lower level for a @large-soul-of-a-nameless-soldier
steps.yplixp5m: Continue down this path and in a cell you'll find the @old-sorcerer-set
steps.rdc8ag9j: The last cell will contain an enemy who drops @great-magic-shield
steps.h38iqm06: Go back to the upper level, cross the bridge in the middle, and the last cell on the right contains a @large-titanite-shard
steps.l3xpdi3d: Turn around and enter the next cell to find @pale-pine-resin[Pale Pine Resin x2] near the destroyed wall
steps.5glmbidz: Go through the rooms and enter the last cell on the other side to find @jailbreakers-key, then reverse direction and open the shortcut door
steps.3e6p5pdh: Cross the bridge back to the other side, head left, and open the window grate at the end of the hallway using your newly acquired key. Drop down the ledge here to find the @bellowing-dragoncrest-ring on the left
steps.epfu6qkl: After jumping down to the bridge head left for @homeward-bone[Homeward Bone x2]
steps.zp741pii: Re-enter the dungeon via the door here and kill the Crystal Lizard who drops a @titanite-scale
steps.j9c35wh9: The next room on this hallway holds a @simple-gem in a small side room on the right
steps.0iomplb5: Retrace your steps all the way outside, then head downstairs and kill the Mimic in the next room for an @estus-shard
steps.zqkydjgo: Go down the hallway in the next room to find a @soul-of-a-weary-warrior
steps.69xwli7n: If you want you can go back to the entrance, jump down the first hole, and quickly take out the Crystal Lizard for a @titanite-chunk (the giant only becomes hostile if you attack it, so you can safely take out the lizard). Otherwise wait until you've defeated the giant. If you are patient you can kill the giant right here. In front of the giant is a @soul-of-a-crestfallen-knight
steps.6yf5mklr: If you don't want to deal with the giant right now go back to where you found the Soul of a Weary Warrior and drop down the hole
steps.nbeletfa: Go up the tunnel for a @soul-of-a-weary-warrior
steps.2y659vxr: You'll find two chests at the end of a hallway. The chest on the left is a Mimic with the @dark-clutch-ring. After you have taken the @old-cell-key from the right chest, you will be ambushed by several @basilisk[Basilisks]. The Old Cell Key will be used to free Siegward later
steps.kbq1gfsp: Turn around, enter the tunnel on the left, and in the next room find @dung-pie[Dung Pie x4]
steps.e2r7osn8: After entering the big room with the jailers go left for a @large-titanite-shard
steps.ejikewim: Continue through the tunnel and near the lift is a dragon statue that has the @dragon-torso-stone. This area will be used later to access the Archdragon Peak once you have the Path of the Dragon gesture
steps.sedynqsw: Go up the lift and find a @large-soul-of-a-nameless-soldier next to the shortcut to the main dungeon
steps.snmasdhh: If you jump off the elevator midway, you'll find the @lightning-blade miracle
steps.syglcivj: Return to the room with several Jailers. To the left, you'll discover a cell containing five @wretch[Wretches] and the @profaned-coal, which grants Dark, Blood, and Hollow infusions
steps.k81zmnny: In the middle of the room is an @ember. On the right side is another @ember
steps.2ejbc3cy: In the short tunnel on the left is a Mimic with @titanite-scale[Titanite Scale x2]
steps.k4obgnqa: In the cell on the far left side, you'll find the @xanthous-ashes and the @dusk-crown-ring
steps.cb1pp6jk: The middle cell on the right holds @karla, but is locked. You'll find the @jailers-key-ring in the next zone
steps.s3opz2kf: In front of Karla's cell, you'll find the @alva-set (this set only appears if you have killed Alva at the start of the dungeon)
steps.9yhn4fez: Head outside and before crossing the bridge go left for a @large-soul-of-a-weary-warrior

steps.wsbh3ud6: At the first bonfire you will find poor Laddersmith Gilligan's dead corpse. You'll receive the Stretch Out gesture and an @undead-bone-shard from examining it
steps.r1xlv8i5: Climb back down, go outside using the hole in the wall, and take the ladder to the left to find @rusted-coin[Rusted Coin x2]
steps.48tjpx9r: The @magic-stoneplate-ring[Magic Stoneplate Ring+2] is at the end of the broken stairs leading down
steps.ujbrfcf6: Use the plank ramp next to the Gargoyle that ambushes you to enter a room with two Crystal Lizards who drop @twinkling-titanite. In the back left you can find a @rusted-gold-coin
steps.6c275br7: Go outside onto the planks and on the right side you can find @blooming-purple-moss-clump[Blooming Purple Moss Clump x3]
steps.0r77f9ub: In the toxic swamp below you can find the @cursebite-ring and a @poison-gem (in the cave behind where you drop down), a @purging-stone (in the open), and a @shriving-stone (behind the building)
steps.pmt5w5j9: Enter the building on the ground floor to find @hand-ogre[Hand Ogres] (I recommend using a weapon with bleed effect and/or @carthus-rouge). If you kill one, you will receive the @eleonora axe. In the same room is @purging-stone[Purging Stone x3]
steps.ttwusv1p: Climb the ladder, take the stairs to the top of the building in this area, and kill the court sorcerer to receive @logans-scroll
steps.v1otfka2: The @flame-stoneplate-ring[Flame Stoneplate Ring+1] is down below, on top of the ground floor entrance
steps.rvt7zbmv: There is @poison-arrow[Poison Arrow x18] on the right side of the roof
steps.yab3sjja: Fall down from the top of the roof into the building for the @wrath-of-the-gods miracle
steps.22olp6pe: In this room, you will find the @court-sorcerer-set and a Mimic chest containing the @court-sorcerers-staff
steps.0rmnua5f: Go down the stairs here to find some @rubbish
steps.m0obmmjs: On the roof where you fought the court sorcerer, look torwards the stairs against the wall. You should see an open window which you can jump into. This leads to the cell that Siegward is stuck in. Open it and exhaust his dialogue, he'll give you a @titanite-slab for saving him. The @covetous-gold-serpent-ring is in the same room
steps.ha5st76l: Return to the roof and follow the stairway up. At the top of the stairs, attack into the alcove directly in front of you to unveil two invisible Jailers. At the end of the hall is the @jailers-key-ring, which is used to free Karla
steps.rn0n6ynu: Exit through the hole in the wall to end up in the giant's cell. If you haven't killed him yet, do so now
steps.goghy8bx: In this room you can also pick up the @profaned-flame pyromancy, a @large-titanite-shard, and another @large-titanite-shard
steps.e6r25hyp: Exit the room through the tunnel on the left, go up the elevator, and open the shortcut to the Irithyll Dungeon bonfire
steps.s6dob6u2: The @covetous-silver-serpent-ring[Covetous Silver Serpent Ring+1] is on a platform in the elevator shaft
steps.va5gksix: Go back to the giant's cell and exit the opposite way for a Mimic chest with @dragonslayer-lightning-arrow[Dragonslayer Lightning Arrow x10]
steps.n357fc3i: Go up the ladder and jump from rafter to rafter for @lightning-bolt[Lightning Bolt x9]
steps.9hoxqeqk: With the giant dead, take out the Crystal Lizard for a @titanite-chunk and pick up a @soul-of-a-crestfallen-knight (if you haven't done so before)
steps.zk4au8tj: From here you can also go to where Karla's cell is and send her to Firelink Shrine. Give her the two remaining pyromancy tomes and, with some effort, you can also give her the @londor-braille-divine-tome and @deep-braille-divine-tome instead of corrupting Irina
steps.4owxc5nw: Teleport to the Irithyll Dungeon bonfire and open the last cell on the right in the first section for a @rusted-gold-coin. Now drop down before the window you opened before, turn around, and open the first cell on the left which contains the @prisoner-chiefs-ashes
steps.y3obm0kq: Go back to the Profaned Capital bonfire
steps.c5p3s7mq: Take the ladder on the wall down and cross the bridge for @onislayer-greatarrow[Onislayer Greatarrow x8] and a @large-soul-of-a-weary-warrior farther on
steps.uvq9xhco: From the bridge drop down onto the structure below to find a matching @onislayer-greatbow
steps.kvd1pfge: Drop farther down and loot a @rusted-coin. At the end of the platform you can find another @rusted-coin
steps.318wzp78: Before the fog gate go right to find three chests. The leftmost chest is a Mimic with the @greatshield-of-glory. The chest next to it is also a Mimic, with @rusted-gold-coin[Rusted Gold Coin x2]. The right chest is real and contains an @ember
steps.ao7ztz16: Enter the boss room. If you are following Siegward's quest, a cutscene will show Siegward has come with you to help put his old friend to rest. Defeat @yhorm-the-giant; receive @cinders-of-a-lord + @soul-of-yhorm-the-giant. Speak to Siegward for a @siegbrau
steps.cgdroo8q: Upon defeating Yhorm, you will probably be teleported to @emma at the High Wall of Lothric (since this is the third Lord of Cinder). Speak with her to obtain the @basin-of-vows. Approach the statue of a beheading knight to start the boss fight against the @dancer-of-the-boreal-valley
steps.1a00xtb7: If Siegward helped you defeat Yhorm, return to Yhorm's boss room to find Siegward's @storm-ruler + @pierce-shield as well as his @catarina-set[Catarina Armor Set]. If Yhorm is your second Lord of Cinder simply walk towards the flame on the outside and Siegward will die, dropping the items

steps.ys9jjm4v: After defeating the Dancer of the Boreal Valley, you can place the basin and climb the ladder to access Lothric Castle
steps.4gzjby0p: Take the first left to enter the Consumed King's Garden and pick up a @soul-of-a-weary-warrior
steps.3r5zyhkr: Halfway down the elevator, jump off to a platform and then head down the stairs to find an @estus-shard on the right
steps.maaiza8m: From here go left and drop down to the stairs to find a @titanite-chunk
steps.p825ozgo: The @sage-ring[Sage Ring+2] is on another set of broken stairs
steps.ff5r425a: To the right of the elevator structure is a @ring-of-sacrifice
steps.uu6q3bqr: The @wood-grain-ring[Wood Grain Ring+1] is behind the elevator
steps.hs6jlv63: Around where the slugs are you can find @black-firebomb[Black Firebomb x2], the @claw, the @shadow-set, and a @human-pine-resin
steps.im4c64ae: Below the stairs on the left is a @dark-gem. Go up the stairs for a @titanite-chunk
steps.lqutl3xu: On the right side you can find @human-pine-resin[Human Pine Resin x2] and another @titanite-chunk
steps.eayeerso: On the right side of the garden is a door with an elevator. Go up and enter the next room to find a @titanite-scale and a @titanite-chunk. Open the shortcut while you're here
steps.sly627ct: Take the elevator back down and jump off at the halfway point to find the @dragonscale-ring
steps.jcjr82d0: You can summon @hawkwood[Hawkwood the Deserter] for assistance if he has left Firelink Shrine. His summon sign is located on the large platform before the two knights
steps.t2fnq7fo: Kill the second greatsword-wielding knight outside the boss room to receive the @magic-stoneplate-ring
steps.3puufemn: After defeating Oceiros, continue on down and you'll find the Path of the Dragon gesture on a body
steps.nbjjtfwl: To the left of the gesture is a chest containing a @titanite-scale. Further on is a second chest holding another @titanite-scale. Advance through the illusory wall behind this chest to enter the Untended Graves

steps.67vllf7v: From the bonfire go straight to find a @shriving-stone
steps.fkbp21vr: Collect the @ashen-estus-ring located to the left from the bonfire
steps.msysitup: Pick up a @soul-of-a-crestfallen-knight near the square centre
steps.q29px640: Near the left outer wall is a @titanite-chunk
steps.s9o5c6uv: Kill the two Ravenous Crystal Lizards for four @titanite-scale[Titanite Scales]
steps.p26aqedn: Where the first bonfire was in Cemetery of Ash, you'll be invaded by @daughter-of-crystal-kriemhild if you're embered
steps.nf5tfs7j: Follow the path on the left for a @hidden-blessing
steps.plzanvl8: @sword-master is available to be summoned outside the boss room
steps.hn9594jv: In the arena is also the @black-knight-glaive
steps.zawat6ra: At the very end of the Untended Graves when you reach the alternate version of Firelink Shrine, explore the graves for the @hornet-ring (on the right where Hawkwood's Shield was) and @chaos-blade (where Sword Master was)
steps.bfq1guh3: Above the shrine entrance is a @soul-of-a-crestfallen-knight
steps.r86pe3iy: Inside Firelink Shrine, you will discover the @coiled-sword-fragment where the bonfire normally is
steps.3ll1scju: The @life-ring[Life Ring+3] is behind Lothric's throne
steps.bdkn8koh: There is another Shrine Handmaid here that sells the @wolf-knight-set[Wolf Knight Armor Set], the @priestess-ring, and other merchandise. Unlike the regular Handmaid, she will not respawn if killed, so be careful
steps.t9haiumx: Where Andre normally is, you will find the @blacksmith-hammer
steps.gfoa73r5: Activate the illusory wall to where Irina normally is and you'll find the @eyes-of-a-fire-keeper. These can be given to the Fire Keeper to enable the End of Fire ending
steps.28hhuzr9: If Yuria of Londor did not spawn in your game, you will find @hollows-ashes where Yoel would normally be
steps.56zcj44g: The @ring-of-steel-protection[Ring of Steel Protection+1] is outside next to the tower

steps.uz6evipi: Return to the area in the Irithyll Dungeon with the dragon statue and perform the Path of the Dragon gesture to be teleported to Archdragon Peak
steps.8xvmxiwh: From where you spawn head to the tree for a @soul-of-a-weary-warrior
steps.wou9dgw3: At the top of the big rock farther on is a @lightning-gem
steps.siel5jnl: On the left cliff is @homeward-bone[Homeward Bone x2]
steps.khqi7mku: A @titanite-chunk is behind some rocks a bit farther on
steps.s8j6eelw: Next to the bonfire is an @ember
steps.jrq4k5dn: To the right of the structure in front of you is a @soul-of-a-nameless-soldier and to the left is a @titanite-chunk
steps.cdwndeny: On top of the structure is the @ancient-dragon-greatshield and in the corner below is another @titanite-chunk
steps.jkbp2okk: Follow the path to the left of the gate to obtain the @lightning-clutch-ring
steps.eare7zyn: Defeat the @ancient-wyvern boss and you'll receive the @dragon-head-stone
steps.6scn3tbp: After defeating the Ancient Wyvern, you will be transported to the Dragon-Kin Mausoleum bonfire
steps.edg4z7qo: Return to the entrance of the Ancient Wyvern boss area
steps.vux3c535: In the middle of the arena is a @large-soul-of-a-weary-warrior
steps.hf0jn9pm: Go to the right and pick up @stalk-dung-pie[Stalk Dung Pie x6], an @ember, and another @ember
steps.oiqub940: The railing is broken at the end, allowing you to walk along the edge. At the end of the path is the @ring-of-steel-protection
steps.jwlyiquh: Left of the arena middle is a @large-soul-of-a-nameless-soldier. Go up the stairs and left for @lightning-urn[Lightning Urn x4]
steps.tcsmc5la: Continue down the normal path until you can go left into the dome building to find a @titanite-chunk
steps.yggy21be: Go down the ladder to find @twinkling-titanite[Twinkling Titanite x2]
steps.y3prq6nv: Go back to the normal path and on the edge of the platform is @dung-pie[Dung Pie x3]
steps.06uqufx0: Go up the stairs and get to the top of this building for @titanite-chunk[Titanite Chunk x2] and @lightning-bolt[Lightning Bolt x12]
steps.ut0lqckt: Head to the area where you did the plunging attack, but this time climb up the ladder on the other end for @twinkling-titanite[Twinkling Titanite x2]
steps.7q643g8s: Kill the @drakeblood-knight back at the Dragon-Kin Mausoleum to receive the @drakeblood-greatsword. After killing the Drakeblood Knight, return to the Oceiros, the Consumed King bonfire and run up to the altar where you got the Path of the Dragon gesture to find the @drakeblood-set waiting for you there
steps.uhaoad0x: Perform the Path of the Dragon gesture in front of the altar in the Dragon-Kin Mausoleum to receive the @calamity-ring
steps.y6wgk4qt: Turn around at the altar and follow the path for a @titanite-scale as well as another @titanite-scale further up
steps.tpdjb0yv: Entering the altar room you can find a @soul-of-a-crestfallen-knight in the back left
steps.t6ta9s2t: On the right side of the top level is an exit to the exterior with a @titanite-scale on a corpse
steps.8c6neizr: After going back in you can turn left to activate a shortcut
steps.2cwtpdid: Examine the wooden gate to receive the @dragonslayer-spear
steps.9mlncyq4: Proceed down the stairs, follow the path, and climb the ladder near the scaffolding to receive the @thunder-stoneplate-ring
steps.so5eu0xg: Go along the path until you come to a Crystal Lizard who drops @twinkling-titanite[Twinkling Titanite x3]. The chest in the next room contains @titanite-scale[Titanite Scale x3]
steps.ddhi8dol: In the former room you can jump on the small stone altar to pick up the @soul-of-a-weary-warrior
steps.zwr8defp: As you advance, you will encounter a Wyvern. You can kill this dragon safely by using arrows. Slaying it will reward you with @titanite-chunk[Titanite Chunk x6] + @titanite-scale[Titanite Scale x3] + @twinkling-titanite[Twinkling Titanite x3] and 50,000 souls
steps.xqawhpqj: In the next building, you should encounter the @rapier-champion; slay him for @ricards-rapier. (It's also possible to get a @havel-knight, who drops @dragon-tooth + @havels-greatshield)
steps.vc4zmv7b: In the following room, you will encounter a bell with a lever. Do not ring this bell until you are finished with this zone
steps.pqqm5ae6: Advance to discover the Great Belfry bonfire
steps.89xqhs0o: If you go down the stairs you can find a @large-soul-of-a-crestfallen-knight in the middle
steps.jqrd0a9y: If he moved on from Firelink Shrine, you can summon @hawkwood[Hawkwood the Deserter] at the bottom of the stairs outside the the Great Belfry bonfire. He will assist you to get to the top of the stairway with loads of enemies in the path. Use the Path of the Dragon gesture at the altar at the very top of the stairway (Hawkwood will show you where) and you'll get the @twinkling-dragon-torso-stone
steps.w8x5iy8e: On the way up the hill to get the Twinkling Dragon Torso Stone, you will find the @dragon-chasers-ashes off to the left side
steps.zpswy3tx: @havels-ring[Havel's Ring+1] is in a corner behind the structure halfway up the hill
steps.ldyh2acc: Go down the hill and through the structure on the left to end up at a ladder. Next to the ladder is a chest with @twinkling-titanite[Twinkling Titanite x3]
steps.lpq6e3lo: Climb the ladder to discover @havel-knight[Havel] standing in front of a dead dragon. Kill him for @dragon-tooth + @havels-greatshield. Next to the dragon is a @titanite-slab
steps.r1z7mjxj: To the left of Havel, you can drop down a ledge to find the @great-magic-barrier miracle
steps.bt12ad0p: After defeating Havel, you can find @havels-set near the @stray-demon above the Old Wolf of Farron
steps.632wm16w: Head back to Firelink Shrine and talk to Andre. He'll give you a message from Hawkwood asking you to come to the Abyss Watchers bonfire to settle things. Head there and battle @hawkwood. If you win, you gain the @twinkling-dragon-head-stone. If you lose, Hawkwood takes your @twinkling-dragon-torso-stone. You can battle him as many times as you like until you beat him
steps.5ut3hba5: Ring the bell to unlock the next boss battle
steps.qofjijch: After killing the Nameless King turn around and pick up the @ember from the corpse in the other room
steps.zbakbzcz: On the path towards the mausoleum you'll find a @titanite-slab and farther on the @dragonslayer-set
steps.5db1z4ba: The @covetous-gold-serpent-ring[Covetous Gold Serpent Ring+2] is on one of the side stairways

steps.s5z684mk: @greirat-of-the-undead-settlement[Greirat] will request to pillage Lothric Castle. If you allow him, he will die on this trip as there is no method to saving him. His corpse with @greirats-ashes will be found later in the Grand Archives, enabling all of his wares at the Shrine Handmaiden and unlocking @lightning-urn, @splintering-bolt, and @exploding-bolt. If you send him out, talk to @unbreakable-patches, as he will ask where Greirat goes. He will then leave and come back later with a hidden blessing after you defeat a boss
steps.szg7vxnw: Advance past the three Lothric Knights to the Lothric Castle bonfire, picking up the @soul-of-a-crestfallen-knight along the way
steps.smegbz4n: In the next room, you will find the @prayer-set in a chest
steps.bpaausmv: On the railing to the left is a @titanite-chunk
steps.mf0nugj4: Continue outside and enter the room on the right. There will be a Winged Knight with twinaxes and a @twinkling-titanite behind the ladder. Climb the ladder and there will be an illusionary wall to a room with the @winged-knight-set and @sacred-bloom-shield
steps.yz2lteei: Go outside again and at the fork go left for a @titanite-chunk
steps.zpjn0593: Go up the right stairs, down, and left for a @large-soul-of-a-weary-warrior
steps.bl4s4m09: On the other side is @titanite-chunk[Titanite Chunk x2]
steps.muvq6abm: Get back to the main path and in the next area you will find the Dragon Barracks bonfire
steps.djsm7s46: In a corner by the bonfire is an @ember
steps.l1kej95r: Head up the stairs to the left to find a Lothric Knight and a corpse containing the @greatlance
steps.g6mjl0am: Starting at the Dragon Barracks bonfire, go up the stairs and to the bridge where the two @lothric-wyvern[Lothric Wyverns] are. You can kill a wyvern using a bow, causing the second to die as well. Additionally, you can target the @pus-of-man at the wyvern's feet, this will cause the Lothric Wyverns to despawn. Alternatively, you can kill these mobs with melee later
steps.8288txmy: Run almost all the way across the bridge and drop off at the end. An @undead-bone-shard is underneath the bridge
steps.o7jqmw5s: Drop down and pick up @twinkling-titanite[Twinkling Titanite x2] (on the left side), a @titanite-chunk, and another @titanite-chunk
steps.q7hcbw0n: Break the barrels and boxes in the next room to reveal @lightning-urn[Lightning Urn x3]
steps.zdjay1am: Kill the Crystal Lizard outside for @twinkling-titanite[Twinkling Titanite x2]. (Note: If you kill this lizard and then die or reload before killing the second one in this area, that one will disappear permanently)
steps.jfnfu6nx: Farther and on the right is a @large-soul-of-a-nameless-soldier
steps.pv0lzpet: Go up the small stairs, kill the Winged Knight, and pick up @sniper-crossbow + @sniper-bolt[Sniper Bolt x11] behind him
steps.a33ns7km: Circle back to the bridge and drop down at the near end for a @titanite-chunk
steps.bvjpolaw: Continue left until you can enter a room with a @large-soul-of-a-nameless-soldier and a @raw-gem
steps.67hhj08u: Go downstairs to encounter a @boreal-outrider-knight in a cellar. After killing it, you will receive the @irithyll-rapier. In this room you will also find four chests containing @twinkling-titanite[Twinkling Titanite x2], a single @twinkling-titanite, a @titanite-scale, and the @spirit-tree-crest-shield
steps.uuxp5oxj: Take the path right across where the wyverns would spit fire and on the left in the next room is @black-firebomb[Black Firebomb x3]. Go up the ladder and on the edge is a @large-soul-of-a-nameless-soldier
steps.90958w3l: Kill the Pus of Man for @titanite-chunk[Titanite Chunk x2] + @ember[Ember x2]
steps.4bd8x7jd: Turn around and take the exit on the same level to find a @titanite-chunk, a Crystal Lizard who drops @twinkling-titanite[Twinkling Titanite x2], and a @titanite-scale at the end. (Note: If you have died or reloaded since killing the first lizard in this area, the second one will have disappeared permanently)
steps.vdp2i7kk: The @life-ring[Life Ring+2] is on a ledge below the Titanite Chunk
steps.5j38k4qx: Now that the wyverns are dead you can pick up these items here in peace: @lightning-urn[Lightning Urn x6], a @refined-gem, an @ember, and another @ember
steps.89qxmfyk: Enter the room with the ladder again, go up the stairs, and at the top you'll find a Mimic with @titanite-scale[Titanite Scale x3]. Next to it is a @pale-pine-resin
steps.d5nhw97x: Exit to the right for another @titanite-scale
steps.ku4194bc: Continue to the next room for a lever. Pull this lever to open the gate underneath the wyverns
steps.qz9z34b9: On the edge you can find a @large-soul-of-a-weary-warrior
steps.uq9xqv1q: An @ember can be found left of the stairs leading up
steps.pfzmucx5: After clearing your way to the roof, you will encounter the entrance to the Dragonslayer Armour boss fight. Opposing this entrance, you will find a shortcut elevator to the entrance of Lothric Castle
steps.mfyzayxe: Next to the shortcut is also a @sunlight-medal
steps.7ogxf8qi: Facing away from the Dragonslayer Armour bossfight entrance, a doorway lit by torches is to the left. Proceed through the door and up the stairs. On the right is @rusted-coin[Rusted Coin x2] as well as a chest with a @titanite-scale
steps.3nxgajhy: Turn around and exit using the door you can see. You will find the @red-tearstone-ring on a body to the right. Drop off the ledge to find @caithas-chime
steps.3nl4fzro: The @thunder-stoneplate-ring[Thunder Stoneplate Ring+2] is at the back end of the roof slightly above the chime
steps.cdnxgl85: Facing away from the Dragonslayer Armour bossfight entrance, head to the right and drop off the ledge to kill the @pus-of-man for @titanite-chunk[Titanite Chunk x2] + @ember[Ember x2]. Next to it is a @soul-of-a-crestfallen-knight
steps.250bodlr: Inside the building, you will find a Mimic chest containing the @sunlight-straight-sword. In the same room, you will find a corpse with the @braille-divine-tome-of-lothric
steps.yqsgoq5c: The @dark-stoneplate-ring[Dark Stoneplate Ring+1] is outside on the balcony
steps.896xn39i: Facing away from the Dragonslayer Armour bossfight entrance, head to the right and use the ladder on the building to climb up it. You can find a @titanite-chunk on the side facing the fog door
steps.62vbv2bs: Head over the roofs to the windows of an opposite building. Climb down the ladder and you will find the @knights-ring
steps.o1nesfjz: Continue across the bridge to reach the Altar of Sunlight. Pray at it to receive the Praise the Sun gesture and offer @sunlight-medal[Sunlight Medals] for the @warrior-of-sunlight covenant. The chest contains @titanite-scale[Titanite Scale x3]. Open the door revealing a shortcut back to the Dragonslayer Armour area
steps.c4fygl9v: @eygon-of-carim can be summoned for the Dragonslayer Armour fight if you have not purchased any dark miracles from Irina and talked to him in Firelink Shrine so he disappears from there. His summon sign will be available in the chapel to the right of the boss area
steps.ikyhols9: @sirris-of-the-sunless-realms[Sirris] can be summoned for this fight if you are friendly. Her summon sign is below the second set of stairs
steps.pa2xd0t2: If @eygon-of-carim has left Firelink Shrine, his dead body can now be found in Irina's original cell in the Undead Settlement, containing @mornes-great-hammer + @moaning-shield. You can then purchase @mornes-set[Morne's Armor Set] from the Shrine Handmaid
steps.zhusykbv: There are two ends to Irina's side quest depending on your actions. (Note: If option B didn't happen yet check back after the Twin Princes fight)
steps.293le3dc: Irina A: By giving her just the @braille-divine-tome-of-carim and @braille-divine-tome-of-lothric, or by giving her all 4 Tomes, but not buying any dark miracles, you can make Irina a Fire Keeper. Just buy all her standard spells, plus Med Heal, Tears of Denial, Force, Bountiful Light, Blessed Weapon, and Magic Barrier. (If you want the Saint's Ring, be sure to purchase it now, as she will no longer offer it later.) She'll move to the bottom of the tower to the left of Firelink Shrine after you refresh the world and will now act as a Fire Keeper. If you did give her the Londor and Deep Tome instead of Karla, they will be on the ground beside her and you can now give them to Karla
steps.ioiabxg2: Irina B: If you gave Irina the @londor-braille-divine-tome or @deep-braille-divine-tome and bought ANY of these spells (Deep Protection, Gnaw, Dark Blade, Vow of Silence, or Dead Again), she will have disappeared for you sometime in the game from her normal location in Firelink Shrine. She would then be outside near the Iudex Gundyr fight area with Eygon. Eygon will believe you have killed her and is hostile. Upon killing him, you see that Irina is still actually alive, but the corruption has begun for her. This is an alternate way of Morne's Armor Set being available for purchase. After Irina returns to Firelink Shrine, buying all the dark miracles listed above will fully corrupt her and she'll no longer act as a vendor to you. Equipping Morne's Gauntlets allows her to believe you to be Eygon and she'll ask to be killed. Do so and you can give her ashes to the Shrine Handmaid to sell her miracles

steps.9jjgtmrr: From the Dragonslayer Armour bonfire, facing the Grand Archives go right downstairs to find a @titanite-chunk
steps.05sh1alv: In the first area, you will find the Grand Archives bonfire with @black-hand-gotthard's corpse nearby, containing @grand-archives-key + @gotthard-twinswords. (Note: This body will only appear once three Lords of Cinder, namely the Abyss Watchers, Aldrich, and Yhorm, have fallen)
steps.qs3squ1v: Once inside the Grand Archives, you will notice a Crystal Sage. Killing him will give you the @crystal-scroll
steps.6zozst1b: If you have given @orbeck-of-vinheim all four scrolls and bought every spell he offers, he will tell you he is departing. You'll now be able to summon him for the Twin Princes fight
steps.a2tob4cq: On the left side of the archives is a Crystal Lizard who drops @crystal-gem + @twinkling-titanite
steps.sluil6li: From the lizard go right, then take the first left for a @soul-of-a-crestfallen-knight
steps.dwts3xmp: Now go up the stairs and right to find a @titanite-chunk
steps.rxj3728h: You will encounter an altar with four Scholars. After killing them, you can dunk your head in wax which will temporarily prevent the curse hands from harming you
steps.erg9q6tw: Nearby you will find a Lothric Knight. In the room following him you will find the @crystal-chime
steps.qmae9tka: Go back outside. On the left is a @titanite-chunk. Then drop down for another @titanite-chunk
steps.ogw69ihn: When standing before the altar turn around and on the right you'll see a @titanite-scale on the bookcases
steps.qe6ouitz: Advance into the dark room, which has two Crystal Lizards who drop @twinkling-titanite + @chaos-gem and @twinkling-titanite[Twinkling Titanite x2] as well as a corpse with a @soul-of-a-nameless-soldier
steps.nnd4zm1g: Against the wall you will find a lever which will unlock a room containing @witchs-locks and @power-within
steps.c7crxhq8: On the top level of the dark room is a @titanite-scale
steps.mjp1gch5: Leave the dark room and you will encounter a ladder which you can kick down to open a shortcut to the bottom floor
steps.j3tmafbh: Take a right before the ladder to find a @titanite-chunk
steps.3l1vpqkc: On the left is a Crystal Lizard who drops @twinkling-titanite[Twinkling Titanite x2]
steps.op3cg0zi: The lever in the middle between the bookcases will unlock a room near the first wax altar containing a Titanite Slab
steps.y8bl32sl: Go outside to find @homeward-bone[Homeward Bone x3]
steps.giu63pg6: Inside and up the left stairs is another wax altar and a @titanite-chunk
steps.64ylp4s6: Near the broken railing where a single Scholar is standing, drop down onto the bookshelf below to find a @titanite-scale and then roll off these onto bookshelves even farther below for the @avelyn
steps.8nn0ifzs: Return to the first wax altar, turn around, and on the back right is now a path that was revealed by pulling the second lever. Grab the @titanite-slab in the chest
steps.dkycezob: Go back to the upper level and continue along. After ending up at the top, go left, and in a corner is a @titanite-scale
steps.2qph5oi9: On the same level is a wall in the back left with gates. Hit it to reveal a room with a @boreal-outrider-knight. Defeat it for the @outrider-knight-set. Exit through the back for the @soul-stream sorcery
steps.j6flco33: Exit the illusory wall room, turn left, and next to the ladder in a corner is a @titanite-scale
steps.penpo1ca: Climb down the ladder and you'll see a @shriving-stone by the railing
steps.tb2s0e2g: Before crossing the bridge, pull the lever to the right to open a passage containing the @scholar-ring
steps.qwt8plat: Cross the bridge and take the elevator to the ground floor. Pull the lever to reveal a shortcut that returns you to the entrance
steps.eorl9nqz: If you intend to send @greirat-of-the-undead-settlement on his final journey, this is a good time to do so. You will be able to pick up his ashes soon
steps.q5x9m8wa: Returning to the bridge, there is a broken railing on the right. Drop down to find a Crystal Lizard with @titanite-scale[Titanite Scale x2]. Use the elevator shortcut to return and then proceed upstairs
steps.nox3wzif: In the back of the room with the four Archive Scholars is a @large-soul-of-a-crestfallen-knight. In the chest to the left of the exit is @titanite-scale[Titanite Scale x3]
steps.e95p44nd: In the next room is a Crystal Lizard with @twinkling-titanite + @refined-gem. The @fleshbite-ring will be to the right of it
steps.e3lak1ag: On a rooftop with a landing is a wall with some broken segments and a @titanite-chunk
steps.vdc5r34r: Continue along the rooftops and go up the left for a @soul-of-a-weary-warrior
steps.asubyh7o: On the big roof to the left are two Crystal Lizards who drop @twinkling-titanite + @heavy-gem and @twinkling-titanite + @sharp-gem
steps.fmhara4w: Drop to the lower platform with the Corvians and go into the small room to the right for a @hollow-gem. Go outside and to the right for a @titanite-chunk
steps.rt5swv0w: Go past where the Corvians were and jump to the lower platform for @titanite-scale[Titanite Scale x3] and @greirats-ashes[Greirat Ashes] if you sent him out to scavenge
steps.nritxnyk: Go back to the roof where the two Crystal Lizards were and stick to the right wall. After dropping down to another roof you will find a @titanite-chunk
steps.fnomjmo6: Continue sticking to the right wall until you get to a broken window you can enter. Inside you'll find the last @undead-bone-shard and an @ember. You can also kick down the ladder here for a shortcut
steps.6658uayu: Go all the way to the other side of the archives for @titanite-chunk[Titanite Chunk x2] on a corpse out on the balcony
steps.iqn78l4p: On the path you probably noticed a door. Step outside and you will encounter three NPCs: @black-hand-kamui, @daughter-of-crystal-kriemhild, and @lion-knight-albert. Killing them will reward you with @onikiri-and-ubadachi, the @sages-crystal-staff, and the @golden-wing-crest-shield, respectively
steps.x65dwsmf: Continue up the stairs and you will find an elevator shortcut to the Grand Archives bonfire
steps.e8v0z1bm: At the very top of the Grand Archives, you will see a series of barricades leading to the Twin Princes fight. Turn around and go up the stairs. On the railing around the left is a @soul-of-a-crestfallen-knight
steps.2xkha0m3: Go up the other roof where the three Gertrude's Knights are. You'll find the last @estus-shard on the very back of this roof
steps.t8tlyi8s: Killing all the knights on the roof awards you a @titanite-slab, but only once
steps.fekyfv8z: At the top of the tower you will find the @hunters-ring
steps.dh290e0a: The @lingering-dragoncrest-ring[Lingering Dragoncrest Ring+2] is in an alcove on the side opposite the ladder
steps.6loldt06: Enter the lower entrance to the building and drop into the cage to receive the @divine-pillars-of-light miracle
steps.tbux8br6: Exit the cage and on the rafters is a @blessed-gem
steps.aduvqnhh: The @sage-ring[Sage Ring+1] is on the lower rafters
steps.yue38mdo: Drop down to the stone rafters and climb down the ladder on the side with the Man-grub. Down here are two chests containing a @divine-blessing and @twinkling-titanite[Twinkling Titanite x3]
steps.iton3wow: Return to the barricades and fight your way to the top. You will find an elevator shortcut leading to Lothric Castle's Dragonslayer Armour courtyard
steps.nnedak1c: This elevator has a second elevator underneath it. Send the elevator up and take the second elevator down to claim a @titanite-slab
steps.z59wuftt: @orbeck-of-vinheim will be available to be summoned near the large metal door if you gave him all four sorcery scrolls and purchased all available spells
steps.dhwsp78g: @sirris-of-the-sunless-realms[Sirris] will be available to be summoned at the fog door if you are on friendly terms
steps.y7ididgn: After beating the Twin Princes, you can find @orbecks-ashes on his body in the Grand Archives if he departed from your Firelink Shrine after you bought all his spells. His corpse will be in a chair up the shortcut elevator inside the archives, on the large wooden balcony just before the stairs that lead to the outside. If Yuria assigned you to assassinate Orbeck, give his ashes to her in exchange for the @morion-blade. This also adds Orbeck's @clandestine-coat to the Shrine Handmaid's inventory
steps.3bdcnq3d: Return to Sirris' grandfather's grave in Firelink Shrine after the Twin Princes fight and you'll find her body with the @sunless-talisman on it. You can also now buy Sirris' @sunless-set[Sunless Armor Set] from the Shrine Handmaid
steps.94jw95hp: With Sirris' side quest complete, you are now free to finally continue @leonhard[Leonhard's]. Head to the Rosaria's Bed Chamber bonfire (you might find a Man-grub in here which drops @heysel-pick + @xanthous-crown) and give her a Pale Tongue. Leonhard should now appear in this room. If not, refresh the world. Exhaust his dialogue, refresh the world again and Rosaria will now be dead with a @black-eye-orb on her body
steps.p7e45lpu: Head to the Aldrich, Devourer of Gods bonfire and take either of the lifts in the room up. The @black-eye-orb will react to this room. Use it and you'll invade Leonhard's world. Kill him for @soul-of-rosaria + @crescent-moon-sword + @silver-mask. You can also now buy @leonhards-set[Leonhard's Armor Set] from the Shrine Handmaid. You can give the @soul-of-rosaria to Ludleth for the @bountiful-sunlight miracle. There is no benefit to restoring Rosaria using her soul, as her being dead does not prevent you from offering pale tongues, redistributing attributes, or changing appearance

steps.2v8x7qka: Put all the Cinders of Lords back on their thrones if you haven't already and then interact with the Firelink Shrine bonfire to be teleported to the Kiln of the First Flame
steps.bizn453s: After being teleported, you will find the Flameless Shrine bonfire. As you exit the building, you will find the Kiln of the First Flame. If you return to Firelink Shrine, you will discover the @skull-ring on Ludleth's throne
steps.mmq15qn2: If you have 8 Dark Sigils, you can summon @yuria-of-londor and @londor-pale-shade for the Soul of Cinder fight. If Yuria survives, you will be able to pick up @darkdrift + @black-set at her usual location in Firelink Shrine
steps.vsk1rgfs: Ending Guide: Depending on what you've done up to this point, @endings[you will have certain options for the endings you can select]
steps.ujv1g4vu: Ending 1: If you did not follow the Yoel/Yuria quest line, simply interacting with the First Flame results in the standard "To Link the First Flame" ending. You will receive the @trophy-achievement-guide[To Link the First Flame] achievement (Note: If you did follow the quest line and still want Ending 1, let the Fire Keeper heal the Dark Sigil first)
steps.dwst5yzm: Ending 2: If you obtained the Eyes of a Fire Keeper from the Untended Graves area and gave them to the Fire Keeper, you can use a summon sign next to the bonfire to trigger the "The End of Fire" ending. You will receive the @trophy-achievement-guide[The End of Fire] achievement
steps.hf7e29b0: Ending 3: If you follow the steps to Ending 2, you have a short window where you regain control of your character during the final scene. You can attack the Fire Keeper after the cutscene for a different conclusion, often called the "Unkindled Ending". (Note: There is no achievement for this ending)
steps.0i2lvcaf: Ending 4: If you followed the Yoel/Yuria quest line to this point and have all 8 Dark Sigils (5 from Yoel and 3 from "marrying" Anri), interacting with the First Flame will wrest it from its mantle, triggering the "The Usurpation of Fire" ending. You will receive the @trophy-achievement-guide[The Usurpation of Fire] achievement

steps.g7hw5ww5: To access the DLC area go to the Cleansing Chapel bonfire to find Slave Knight Gael next to the altar. Talk to him and accept his offer to be transported to the Painted World of Ariandel. (Note: If you have already progressed into The Ringed City, Gael will be gone. To enter the Painted World you can instead touch the scrap of a painting, located under a small candelabrum on the right side of the altar)
steps.hdhm28w7: Upon arriving, you'll find @rime-blue-moss-clump[Rime-blue Moss Clump x2] to your left
steps.38tmjbzu: Exit the cave to find the first bonfire
steps.h5a7bj8b: From the bonfire stick to the left wall until you see a @large-soul-of-an-unknown-traveler next to a hill in the center
steps.vnn7qdqu: Continue along the left wall until you get to a fly and a @poison-gem
steps.tb6z2z71: Stick to the wall again and follow it until the snow platform breaks. On a corpse is a @rime-blue-moss-clump
steps.w4sxsy5e: Go along the right wall, past a lone wolf, and up the hill to find a @large-soul-of-an-unknown-traveler and the @follower-javelin a bit farther up
steps.iwoawy37: Go back to where you dropped off and in the middle of the forest, next to a tree, is a @rusted-coin
steps.ef0ovyrz: Continue going straight towards the cliff and the Gravetender Greatwolf should attack you. At around 50% he disappears and leaves you with @large-titanite-shard[Large Titanite Shard x3]
steps.r83hea2s: Around where the wolf first notices you is a corpse with a @large-soul-of-an-unknown-traveler
steps.7jlg1lt7: Under the big rock, where the wolf was on, is a tree with another @large-soul-of-an-unknown-traveler next to it
steps.siy3yq84: From here follow the cliff and on the part where it juts out is @homeward-bone[Homeward Bone x6]
steps.h9uw9tg7: Go towards the tower and with your back to it you can see a @heavy-gem in the corner of one of the structures
steps.n2ft5xai: Enter the tower. (Note: It might help if you equip the Silvercat Ring for the tower section)
steps.46dnmxg2: On the ground floor is a @soul-of-a-weary-warrior
steps.w26n9xbb: After climbing up the ladder go down the stairs to find the @ethereal-oak-shield
steps.98afpgto: On the next set of stairs is a Crystal Lizard with a @twinkling-titanite
steps.co28g9c4: Now go to the top floor and climb up the ladder on the outside to find a @large-soul-of-a-weary-warrior as well as the @captains-ashes on the rafters. Giving these ashes to the Handmaiden enables you to buy three @refined-gem[Refined Gems], the @millwood-set[Millwood Knight Set], and @millwood-greatarrow[Millwood Greatarrows]
steps.hq91nvru: From the rafters drop down to the corpse to get the @millwood-battle-axe
steps.21agw270: Exit the tower and go around it on the right to find a @blessed-gem
steps.1et6x52x: With your back to the tower entrance head straight towards the hill with the trees
steps.nyk84iwx: Go up the hill and left to find @millwood-greatbow + @millwood-greatarrow[Millwood Greatarrow x5] next to some Millwood Knights
steps.0cftxjyo: Now take the other available way from the tower
steps.qpmxfn1k: Upon going up the hill you will be attacked by the Gravetender Greatwolf plus some normal wolves. The wolf again drops @large-titanite-shard[Large Titanite Shard x3]
steps.qchcpfgm: Continue this way and the snow will break again. Drop down the ledges and on the last one is a @large-soul-of-an-unknown-traveler
steps.xloylt0u: Go left from here and pick up @black-firebomb[Black Firebomb x2] up the hill. In the maggot pit is the @frozen-weapon sorcery
steps.fnpuxocr: Go up to the trees and pick up the @large-titanite-shard on the left wall
steps.pfphsesa: Now go back to where you dropped off after defeating the wolf and go right to find the Rope Bridge Cave bonfire
steps.6ar1auhu: Cross the bridge and pick up a @hollow-gem to the right of the entrance to the chapel
steps.525m5ad7: Talk to @sir-vilhelm, open the door, and light the Ariandel Chapel bonfire
steps.z2s27hwc: Talk to Friede two times to gain the @chillbite-ring
steps.90wj084s: Go back outside, destroy the bridge to create a ladder, and climb it down. At the bottom you can find @rime-blue-moss-clump[Rime-blue Moss Clump x4] on a corpse on the right wall
steps.3n1lb8tu: Drop down to the roots and go along until you find a Crystal Lizard who drops @twinkling-titanite
steps.f4y4t0vp: Stick to the right wall to find an @ember
steps.csszwzcy: On one of the lower roots you can find the @follower-sabre near the cliff
steps.np2k7746: After reaching the frozen lake you can activate the bonfire and rest at it
steps.8mtri151: In the lake you can see a frozen Giant Crab. Upon approaching it another one will come out of the lake. Killing both of them rewards you with a @crystal-gem
steps.j7wct2tj: Take the path behind the crab to find @homeward-bone[Homeward Bone x2] up a small hill
steps.ehhiqf6d: Continue along this path to find a mad tree who guards the @snap-freeze sorcery
steps.kc8wgixh: Killing the mad tree also reveals a big ladder on the small hill where the Homeward Bones were. Climb it and the one after that to get to a @titanite-slab
steps.a16ghdgk: Continue further and drop down to find a @shriving-stone next to some flies
steps.w1pycafu: Ignore the ladder up (it leads to the Rope Bridge Cave bonfire) and keep going forward to find a Crystal Lizard who drops a @large-titanite-shard
steps.6sf00wq2: Continue this way and after sliding down the hill go right. Next to the cliff is a @large-soul-of-an-unknown-traveler
steps.qphg3iva: From where you slid down take the left path, drop down the ledges, and pick up @budding-green-blossom[Budding Green Blossom x3] on the far side
steps.kpc15mcb: Enter the Corvian Settlement and take the right path to find a @large-soul-of-an-unknown-traveler
steps.a7vyzhak: After climbing up the ladder and entering the house pick up an @ember. There is a Corvian NPC who you can talk to in the kitchen
steps.7n0xd7rn: Exit the house and enter the one on the left to find the Corvian Settlement bonfire
steps.kd016aqn: Enter the leftmost house on the other side of the bridge to find an @ember
steps.gpox8nzt: Exit the house, go right, and drop off on the right side of the bridge to find a @simple-gem. Open up the gate here if you want and return to the bonfire
steps.qdz2a1di: Go back to the bridge, cross it, and go up the left side. A bit farther on you can jump from one side to the other to find a @large-soul-of-an-unknown-traveler in a broken wall
steps.p6jqs77m: Enter the broken structure overlooking the entrance and go left along the wall to find a Crystal Lizard who drops @large-titanite-shard[Large Titanite Shard x2]
steps.7yr1vkfa: Go back to the broken structure and jump towards the @crow-quills on the rock
steps.qhsk3mlt: Enter the settlement again and from the bonfire go to the cemetery gate at the far back and drop down at the cliff. Enter the house with the flies to find a @dark-gem
steps.xgg9hynt: Continue along the cliff until you find a @large-soul-of-an-unknown-traveler
steps.asm9094i: Climb up the ladder, drop down to the bridge, and open the door on the ground floor of the house
steps.rbzk678g: Cross the bridge and pick up the @large-soul-of-an-unknown-traveler on the roof
steps.8zm3j2oc: Enter the house with the Corvians on top and follow the path up to the roof to find the @crow-talons
steps.uz2m17ej: Climb the ladder on the other house again, enter the tower, and drop down to find the @slave-set[Slave Knight Set]
steps.l81d7fjq: Enter the tower via the roof again, climb up the ladder, and from the bridge drop down to the right roof below to find @rusted-gold-coin[Rusted Gold Coin x3]
steps.mk21wbx0: Now return to the tower and climb up the ladder once more, cross the bridge, and on the other bridge is a Crystal Lizard who drops a @twinkling-titanite
steps.iaasmtjh: Go onto the roof of the church to find a @large-soul-of-a-weary-warrior on a corpse at the tower
steps.ejoagsrt: Use the back right window of the church to drop down to the rafters and find a @soul-of-a-crestfallen-knight
steps.6q98f5i3: The corpse in front of the altar has the @way-of-white-corona miracle
steps.p5q8awpt: Exit the church and open the cemetery gate
steps.cce07v71: Instead of entering the library take a right and pick up the @young-white-branch next to the living tree. Farther in the back is @rusted-coin[Rusted Coin x2]
steps.yu8y0ik4: Defeat @sir-vilhelm in the library to gain @contraption-key + @onyx-blade
steps.3i5gcyun: Activate the lever, go to the second floor, talk to the NPC, and exit to the balcony. Go around the structure to find the bonfire and open the gate
steps.2hdqdlhr: From the bonfire take the path into the forest and stick to the left wall to find @prism-stone[Prism Stone x10] on a corpse
steps.458en0wk: Pass the tree, walk towards the cliff, and go right from here. Go up the hill, sticking to the cliff, and drop down in the back left to find the @follower-shield
steps.thkv6ucg: Go around, take the first right, go straight, looking at the tower, and pick up an @ember in a small cave on the right
steps.vwf11jqo: From the cave continue towards the tower until you get to the cliff. There is a corpse on the right with a @titanite-chunk
steps.r18zsqyn: Turn around, take the first right, and go past the bell while sticking to the right. After taking a right you should see a big tree with a red base. Interact with it to fell it and create a shortcut to an elevator
steps.mr35kfqd: Cross the tree as well as the bridge and on the left is another tree bridge that leads to a platform with another @titanite-chunk
steps.vux4o8qh: Take the same way back to the bell and follow the path up the hill. Take a left and go straight until you meet some wolves as well as @large-titanite-shard[Large Titanite Shard x2] around the corner to the left
steps.f65rfq0v: From here take the lower path to find the @follower-torch
steps.ptww172c: Head back up the hill and take the lower path. Use the Silvercat Ring to jump down to the frozen lake. If you don't have the Silvercat Ring go back to the bell and go up the hill towards the cliff. You can drop down with a snow platform here
steps.t6jo0h6p: Enter the cave right where you jumped down to find the @earth-seeker
steps.fcfgvv9s: Around the lake itself you can find a @large-soul-of-a-crestfallen-knight, a @soul-of-a-crestfallen-knight, and another @soul-of-a-crestfallen-knight
steps.k1uvugh6: After exiting the lake area follow the path along the cliff, go back to the wolves, and go even farther up the hill
steps.0iq0s3ly: Take a left and follow the short path to an enemy and the @quakestone-hammer
steps.2ulrzcr8: Take the other path, drop down a ledge to find @large-titanite-shard[Large Titanite Shard x2], fell the tree to create a shortcut, and enter the tunnel
steps.aqldkt93: In the room with the flies pick up @dung-pie[Dung Pie x2] from the rafter, exit the room by going up, and open the shortcut door to the bonfire
steps.uemangsm: Go back to the room with the flies and drop down to the lower floor
steps.zmyr1f7l: Here you can find a @blood-gem and @vilhelms-set
steps.0roaks2i: If you take the stairs up you can find an illusory wall on the right that leads directly to the room on the upper floor
steps.jvue4ewg: From where the Blood Gem was look towards the entrance on the upper floor and walk towards the pillar with some planks and stones next to it. Activate the handle to reveal a secret passage next to the bonfire
steps.jwgorlkv: When looking at the handle turn left and walk straight towards the wall. Walk right until you see some small steps (you should also hear the sound of a Crystal Lizard). Hit the bricks to reveal an illusory wall
steps.c82nn9h5: In this room are two Crystal Lizards who both drop a @twinkling-titanite
steps.tam3f9sc: Go outside, drop down to the roots, and follow them to the platform on the tower to find @pyromancers-parting-flame + @homeward-bone[Homeward Bone x2]
steps.ld01vnsu: Towards the center of the tower you'll be invaded by Livid Pyromancer Dunnel if you're embered. He drops the @floating-chaos pyromancy
steps.0rie9s3p: You'll have to use a Homeward Bone to leave this place. Warp to the Depths of the Painting bonfire and from here take the way right that leads to the tower
steps.dedout9z: Go back to the Ariandel Chapel bonfire
steps.qhx60c6a: For the following boss you can summon @slave-knight-gael
steps.jqm61x27: During the fight you also gained a @titanite-slab
steps.p8a4pp4x: Travel back to the Corvian Settlement and go to the NPC in the house next to the bonfire. He is in the back where you climbed up the ladder. For defeating the boss you get a @titanite-slab from him. If you have killed this NPC before for some reason the slab will be in the kitchen

steps.3i6s27tm: To access the DLC area go to the Kiln of the First Flame bonfire or the Sister Friede bonfire. Next to either you'll find another bonfire that sends you to The Dreg Heap. You will find an @ember to your right around a round rooftop
steps.3uy5fzi7: After taking the plunge go on the platform and take a left, up the set of stairs, and pick up the @titanite-chunk. Take the other stairs further up to get the @aquamarine-dagger
steps.2hfegd72: Go back to the platform and go towards the item you can see. The floor will break and you will end up in a room with @soul-of-a-weary-warrior, @titanite-scale, @twinkling-titanite, and the @murky-hand-scythe (to the left of the exit, behind the bookshelves)
steps.pzq1cbv1: After taking another plunge go towards the church and pick up @lightning-urn[Lightning Urn x4]. To the left is a wooden platform, remember it but ignore it for now, we'll come back here when the Angel is dead
steps.c9s2j3dl: Inside the church you will find a @soul-of-a-crestfallen-knight
steps.6ach8720: After exiting the church go right and you will find @rusted-coin[Rusted Coin x2] next to the fountain
steps.zcchkzr0: Enter the house and you will find a @titanite-chunk. Further in is the @murky-longstaff
steps.kddcq1j2: After picking up the staff hit the illusory wall on the left (when entering the room) to reveal some stairs. Go up and in the back left corner of the second room is an @ember
steps.973fgpy8: Continue along this path, kick down the ladder on the left, and find the @great-soul-dregs sorcery at the far end of the room
steps.e3ifa03r: Go out on the wooden balcony and fall down at the far end to find the @covetous-silver-serpent-ring[Covetous Silver Serpent Ring+3]
steps.60c98oqm: Go back to the church and take a left. A tower will collapse into the church. Continue just a bit further to find and kill the first Angel Summoner for @twinkling-titanite[Twinkling Titanite x2]
steps.s2rfza4e: Now take the new path thanks to the collapsed tower in the church to find @lapp. Exhaust his dialogue
steps.1khbdwuk: Proceed further and you will see two possible places where you can drop. Ignore the one to the right and instead drop down on a Harald Knight with a plunging attack. Collect a @titanite-chunk and @homeward-bone[Homeward Bone x3]
steps.oddqrmzu: Take the plunge to the Earthen Peak Ruins bonfire. If you have died since meeting Lapp, you will find him to the right on a cliff. If not go to Firelink Shrine and then back to reset the zone
steps.jvg0zk3v: Return to the first bonfire and run all the way to where the first Angel was (near the Lightning Urns). Behind where you dropped down is a @divine-blessing. Go to the wooden platform and collect the @ring-of-steel-protection[Ring of Steel Protection+3]
steps.qqxn7sid: Return to where you first met Lapp, and this time drop down on the right into a bed of ash. On the upper platform you will find @projected-heal in a small alcove
steps.9en0s1ok: From the miracle go left and drop further down to where the Lothric Knights are to find a @large-soul-of-a-weary-warrior and further in the @lothric-war-banner
steps.g2v4ka5g: Consider killing the two Angel Summoners before looking for the items in the ruins. Each of them drops @twinkling-titanite[Twinkling Titanite x2]
steps.d75e4dor: Next to the windmill blades is @black-firebomb[Black Firebomb x4]
steps.qwvx9gm5: In front of the windmill, closer to the cliff edge, is a corpse with a @titanite-chunk
steps.49rm88bs: Go towards the wooden hut on the cliff's edge to find the @desert-pyromancer-garb
steps.h5u7y8kq: Continue to the next hut to find @titanite-chunk[Titanite Chunk x2]
steps.vqkawej5: Turn around and you'll see a cliff that juts out with the @giant-door-shield at the end
steps.z6k6g1k9: From the bonfire you can see an item on a root. In order to get to it you have to cross the tower to the left of it, turn right, and run towards the back and onto the roots to get the @twinkling-titanite
steps.qzakssie: Go to the entrance corridor of the swamp, the one with the two Thralls, and stick to the left to find an @ember
steps.5n78tq2r: Go back out and cross the first collapsed tower on the left to find a @titanite-scale in the second one. Drop down to enter the swamp
steps.lfbt6lj0: Turn around and take the path below the tower to find the @desert-pyromancer-gloves
steps.0wxbyflq: To the left of the gloves, in the swamp, is the @desert-pyromancer-skirt
steps.vvr9897d: In the broken hut at the edge of the swamp is @purple-moss-clump[Purple Moss Clump x4]
steps.hffihkmi: Go onto the giant root next to the hut and at the end find the @ring-of-favor[Ring of Favor+3]. Turn back and drop down to the lower root to find a @titanite-chunk
steps.e2vaz1de: Drop down into the swamp and enter the cave to find a @large-soul-of-a-weary-warrior and a @titanite-slab. If you have died or reloaded at least three times since talking to Lapp at the Earthen Peak Ruins bonfire, he will have gotten the Slab for you and will give it to you after talking to him. If you retrieve the Slab yourself, Lapp will give you a @siegbrau the next time you talk to him
steps.pkt64hqz: Exit the cave and get the @large-soul-of-a-weary-warrior from the middle of the swamp and the @titanite-chunk at the houses
steps.cqn792sl: Go right towards the island to find the @loincloth
steps.h8l1fasq: Stick to the left side, going past the buildings, to find the @harald-curved-greatsword and further up a @homeward-bone
steps.ko65ul04: Drop down here, go up the root, and switch to the other one to find a @titanite-chunk
steps.smtyqbia: Follow the roots all the way up to the roof to find and dispatch the Angel Summoner
steps.ypg07ojm: Now go up the roots to find @desert-pyromancer-zoey at the top. She drops @flame-fan
steps.jj21pl8p: On this path you can find @prism-stone[Prism Stone x6] and the @desert-pyromancer-hood
steps.1dwqkvf0: From the roots drop on to the smaller root on the right to find a @twinkling-titanite
steps.ztpwi45g: After following the roots and dropping down to the tower get onto the roofs on the right to find a @divine-blessing
steps.zkc041t5: Follow the roots down to where the Angel Summoner is to find an @ember
steps.euvks9og: Go to where you first dropped down and light the Within the Earthen Peak Ruins bonfire
steps.oe6mp10d: For the next boss you can summon both @slave-knight-gael and @lapp[Amnesiac Lapp] (if he moved to Earthen Peak Ruins)
steps.owbfjiu9: If you had Lapp get the Titanite Slab for you, you can travel back to Earthen Peak Ruins and pick up a @siegbrau from where he was standing. Then return to The Demon Prince
steps.u0l094i0: Pick up the @small-envoy-banner and display it at the cliff to get to The Ringed City

steps.fjid7t17: Once you've arrived, turn around and get a @titanite-scale
steps.u9qo0f7r: After going down the stairs onto the bridge, take a right and go down the path to find the @ruin-set
steps.qg668j6f: Get to the halfway point on the bridge and drop down from the circular platform on the right. After dropping down to the path, turn around to find a @soul-of-a-crestfallen-knight
steps.u61yq9do: Continue on the path to find a @crystal-lizard who drops @twinkling-titanite + @titanite-scale
steps.hkiypar4: Go around the structure, climb up the ladder, and kill the judicator who drops a @divine-blessing
steps.4duj1gip: On the bridge itself you can find a @large-soul-of-a-weary-warrior, @titanite-chunk[Titanite Chunk x2], an @ember, and @budding-green-blossom[Budding Green Blossom x2]
steps.34j38m25: Go down the stairs below the platform where the judicator was on (on the side facing the bridge) to find a @hidden-blessing in a room
steps.mcta1cru: Now go down the stairs behind the judicator and follow this path to find @purging-stone[Purging Stone x2]
steps.6bhq6icq: After lighting the bonfire go out on the balcony and talk to @lapp to get a @siegbrau. Make sure to exhaust Lapp's dialogue here and then pick up an @ember next to him
steps.ybb4yxon: Take the only path and follow it to find a @hollow-gem on a corpse and stick to the right to find a @titanite-chunk next to a railing
steps.ym5w0jq4: Follow the path and enter the circular room. Inside jump on the chandelier and onto the platform on the outer ring to find a @twinkling-titanite. Below you can find a @shriving-stone
steps.smmnqqd2: Exit this room using the stairs and when coming to the street turn right and head towards the door. Talk to @shira[Shira, Knight of Filianore], making sure to answer Gwyn, and accept her request. She will give you the @sacred-chime-of-filianore
steps.v9n082sv: Turn around and drop down at the right side for a @titanite-chunk
steps.13e6k7hz: Now head towards the first bridge to find @mossfruit[Mossfruit x2]
steps.yfmog54w: Enter the small garden here to be invaded by @seeker-of-the-spurned. He will invade even if you are unembered and killing him rewards you with the @wolf-ring[Wolf Ring+3]. Further in the back is the @black-witch-set
steps.vm8t5y9i: Go back on the street and in a small alcove on the left side, just before the swamp, is @mossfruit[Mossfruit x2]
steps.7jiyjyp5: Go onto the other side and through the corridor to find the @ringed-knight-spear
steps.4k47euuu: Drop down onto the street to find a @large-soul-of-a-crestfallen-knight
steps.fwyldzv0: As you enter the swamp, pick up the @dark-gem before the collapsed tower
steps.f1fv49zd: Take a right to find some stairs that lead to @prism-stone[Prism Stone x4] and the Ringed City Streets bonfire
steps.368bztqa: Exit back out of the bonfire room, drop down one level, go left, and drop down in the corner to find @white-preacher-head
steps.0ru6a7ra: Follow the path to reemerge at the swamp entrance. This time pass the stairs and pick up the @large-soul-of-a-weary-warrior next to some rocks and a @titanite-chunk to the right behind the rocks. Kill the judicator for a @hidden-blessing
steps.2noiayei: From the previous items continue sticking right and go up the hill to find the @ringed-knight-straight-sword
steps.yssst3b5: Turn around and head back down where you pick up the @preachers-right-arm from the collapsed tower, a @soul-of-a-weary-warrior from the smaller structure behind it, and another @soul-of-a-weary-warrior in the middle of the swamp
steps.u1eivt5w: From there head to the back cliff and look behind the rock on the left to find a @titanite-chunk
steps.gyvwfyzi: On the lower left side of the church is the @black-witch-veil
steps.je3quqde: Go on the roof of the church and at the back is a @twinkling-titanite
steps.10nga7r6: Drop down in the back and open up the shortcut to the bonfire
steps.pzlj3jpj: Go out into the swamp and once you stand in it keep using @young-white-branch[Young White Branches] until you transform into a @giant-humanity[Humanity]. (Note: You may only walk in this form.) Now go back to the room where you opened the shortcut and there will be some writing on the wall to the left of the gate. Stand in front of it and a ladder will drop down
steps.s1cldsc9: After going up the ladder progress through the small area and kill the judicator who drops a @divine-blessing, then go down some stairs and further down a ladder. Now cross the bridge, pick up the @large-soul-of-a-crestfallen-knight on the left, and go right to find the @purging-monument. Interact with it
steps.2kjoavke: Head back across the bridge and continue on this path to find the @dragonhead-shield
steps.y9q4gywi: Drop down from there and enter the building ahead to find the @covetous-gold-serpent-ring[Covetous Gold Serpent Ring+3]
steps.hygqmqp9: Just to the right of it you will once again meet @lapp. Talk to him and make sure to speak of the Purging Monument and exhaust his dialogue
steps.yu72o1aj: Leave the room, circle around the structure in your path, and cross a bridge to encounter a @crystal-lizard who drops @twinkling-titanite[Twinkling Titanite x2]
steps.ynozyc64: Continue on in the same direction, dropping down a ledge. When you go upstairs from there and enter the structure you will get invaded by @silver-knight-ledo who drops @ledos-great-hammer. The invasion takes place even if you are unembered
steps.ohv33ud3: Explore the balcony on the left to find @titanite-chunk[Titanite Chunk x2]
steps.f3dplwwm: Exit where you entered and drop down the ledges to find @havels-ring[Havel's Ring+3]
steps.5j0pxr06: Below are three Monks around a @soul-of-a-crestfallen-knight
steps.8hg2j6uf: Turn back in the direction of the swamp entrance and pick up a @titanite-chunk on the left by the collapsed tower
steps.1mbf5vgd: Keep left until you come upon a sunken dome behind which there is a @twinkling-titanite
steps.rexuyv7b: Continue along the left cliff and walk up the hill to find the @white-birch-bow and a @titanite-chunk
steps.1c4plqg7: Go down the hill on the other side to find a white birch with three @young-white-branch[Young White Branches]
steps.qy4wokuj: Enter the structure on the right to find the @church-guardian-shiv
steps.i7x8uqrj: Continue towards the back of the swamp and defeat the @dragonslayer-armour to get the @iron-dragonslayer-set
steps.dw8t4fin: In the vicinity you will find a @titanite-scale and another @titanite-scale
steps.jebhcf3k: Turn around and head back into the swamp. Next to a tree is a @soul-of-a-crestfallen-knight
steps.feyg0uzg: Go back to the bridge behind the church (e.g., by warping to the bonfire and exiting via the shortcut) and take a right to find a @titanite-scale and the @dragonhead-greatshield
steps.uol079rk: On the cliffside where Midir attacks you, you can find @soul-of-a-weary-warrior, @titanite-scale[Titanite Scale x2] (in a small side room from which an enemy comes), @rubbish, and @large-soul-of-a-weary-warrior. (You can also come back later when the dragon is gone from the bridge above and pick up these items without having to worry about the fire)
steps.vumzsxdl: On the path below the cliff you can find @titanite-scale[Titanite Scale x2]
steps.qrmjjmgd: You will get invaded by Moaning Knight at some point in the Shared Graves area. He invades regardless of whether you are embered or not and drops the @blindfold-mask
steps.em3q1kss: After dropping down enter the first grave on the left for a @lightning-gem
steps.x0vs2e2r: After dropping down a second time turn around and walk up the stones to enter another grave
steps.anzjhq7h: Lapp should be in here. Interact with him to gain the Patches Squat gesture if you don't already have it and talk to him. If he is not present simply reset the zone
steps.hhwvgbsk: Turn around and go to where the purple patch of cloth is and a cutscene will play, after which you are now at a lower staircase
steps.b320yxr9: After dropping down once again turn around to find a @blessed-gem
steps.ccws1yk9: Continue up and in the first grave is a mimic chest. It drops the @ring-of-the-evil-eye[Ring of the Evil Eye+3]
steps.tlpovjlq: After lighting the bonfire you can kill the @crystal-lizard, who drops @twinkling-titanite + @titanite-scale
steps.42iv43dv: Go to where Lapp was before to find @champions-bones + @lapps-set (the bones will only be there if you haven't already gotten them from the Ashes of Ariandel DLC)
steps.ikq9lc3m: Go outside, defeat the dragon Midir (necessary to unlock the bossfight), and on the bridge is a @titanite-scale
steps.50he4pqt: Enter the room and to the right of the stairs is an illusory wall. Behind it is another one with a @large-soul-of-a-weary-warrior. Behind this one is yet another illusory wall with the @lightning-arrow miracle
steps.7wb5vez2: Go up the stairs to find a @crystal-lizard who drops @titanite-scale[Titanite Scale x2]
steps.sm56p6ei: In the next room take the elevator that leads you to the shortcut that connects to the Ringed Inner Wall bonfire
steps.8ajqhlyr: Take the elevator down and exit halfway. Take a right and drop down to the @chloranthy-ring[Chloranthy Ring+3]
steps.rds4cgvp: Use the elevator again, but this time go left. Pick up the @ember
steps.lyyi2iae: Attack the statue that isn't holding a sword to reveal an illusory wall. Behind the ladder is a @filianores-spear-ornament
steps.vxr8g779: Take the ladder down to find the @antiquated-plain-set
steps.w8f4f9lv: For the following fight you can summon @shira[Shira, Knight of Filianore], if you accepted her request to put Midir to rest
steps.1pu0h5p0: After killing Midir go back to Shira in the Ringed City Streets and she rewards you with a @titanite-slab
steps.9f5t40ku: Go back to where you picked up the Chloranthy Ring and exit towards the church
steps.gsida1km: Pick up @budding-green-blossom[Budding Green Blossom x3] on the left and then defeat the @ringed-knight to get the @ringed-knight-paired-greatswords
steps.ncki5srz: To the right of where the knight was is the @ritual-spear-fragment
steps.7fh0mg20: Before entering the church, drop down on the left to find @twinkling-titanite[Twinkling Titanite x2]
steps.sp49e11h: You can summon @unbreakable-patches for the next fight if you encountered him in the Shared Grave. His summon sign is inside the church, by the opened door
steps.finevh4q: After entering Filianore's Rest, walk through the broken window and stick to the right to get to a church-like structure. Shira, Knight of Filianore will appear and upon defeating her will drop the @crucifix-of-the-mad-king. She will also drop her @titanite-slab if you did not already obtain it
steps.xfwytth9: From where you started stick to the left now to find a @ringed-knight who rewards you with a @titanite-slab
steps.0ruu6khv: After killing Shira go back to where you first met her to find the door now open and @shiras-set inside
steps.lc9bgock: Go to the start of the DLC, The Dreg Heap bonfire, and interact with the corpse of the old woman to receive the @old-womans-ashes, which allow the Handmaiden to sell the Splitleaf Greatsword (if you haven't already bought it)
steps.unl9fcyz: Bring the @blood-of-the-dark-soul to the painter in Ariandel Chapel if you want
